translation.en: I've got this. I'm good.
translation.zh: ‎我可以的 没问题

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: ‎来

translation.en: Well, I've had them set you up out here so you wouldn't feel quite so confined.
translation.zh:
‎我让他们帮你在外边这里布置好了
‎这样你不会觉得局促

translation.en: The ladies will scandalize the neighborhood
translation.zh: ‎女士们占满两间卧室

translation.en: by occupying both bedrooms.
translation.zh: ‎会惹得邻里流言蜚语

translation.en: I will be staying in town at a bucolic spa called,
translation.zh: ‎我会住在镇上一个农家温泉

translation.en: if you can believe it, The Shoulder Arms.
translation.zh: ‎你敢信么 它叫“肩膀”

translation.en: I will do my editing there. Now, as you know,
translation.zh: ‎我会在那里做审阅 ‎弗里达小姐不仅是护士、理疗师

translation.en: Fraulein Freda is not only a nurse and physical therapist,
translation.zh: ‎弗里达小姐不仅是护士、理疗师

translation.en: she studied nutrition back in the old country.
translation.zh: ‎她还在自己的国家学习过营养学

translation.en: -Ja, liebes Fräulein? -Jawohl, Herr Houseman.
translation.zh:
‎-是吧 亲爱的小姐？
‎-对 豪斯曼先生

translation.en: It's a dry house.
translation.zh: ‎本屋禁酒

translation.en: The owner of the ranch doesn't permit alcohol.
translation.zh: ‎农场主不允许在此饮酒

translation.en: But you're from Pennsylvania. You're no doubt used to it.
translation.zh:
‎不过你来自宾夕法尼亚州
‎一定已经习惯了

translation.en: Saved by the proverbial bell.
translation.zh: ‎来得正是时候

translation.en: Set it here, please.
translation.zh: ‎请放在这里

translation.en: And careful. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 谢谢

translation.en: Observe.
translation.zh: ‎看好

translation.en: Naturally, you'll do your damnedest to get at it.
translation.zh: ‎你要努力得到它

translation.en: By the time you finish the first draft, which is to say, in 90 days,
translation.zh: ‎等你完成第一稿 也就是90天后

translation.en: you should be a world-class sprinter.
translation.zh: ‎你就能成为世界级短跑选手了

translation.en: Rita, come in here, will you?
translation.zh: ‎丽塔 进来一下好吗？

translation.en: This is Mrs. Alexander.
translation.zh: ‎这位是亚历山大女士

translation.en: She types 100 perfect words a minute and takes dictation like a clairvoyant.
translation.zh:
‎她每分钟能打100字
‎还能边打边预测你要说的内容

translation.en: Rita Alexander, Herman Mankiewicz.
translation.zh: ‎丽塔亚历山大 赫尔曼曼奇维兹

translation.en: How do you do, Mr. Mankiewicz?
translation.zh: ‎你好吗 曼奇维兹先生？

translation.en: That's a big question.
translation.zh: ‎问得好

translation.en: Well, since you like working nights, Rita here runs on London time.
translation.zh:
‎因为你喜欢晚上创作
‎丽塔会按伦敦时间工作

translation.en: Her husband is one of our bold lads in the RAF.
translation.zh: ‎她丈夫是皇家空军的一个壮小伙

translation.en: -Flies… What is it, Rita? Spitfires? -Hurricanes.
translation.zh:
‎-开…什么来着 丽塔？喷火式？
‎-飓风式战斗机

translation.en: -My sympathy and prayers. -I beg your pardon?
translation.zh:
‎-我深表同情 为你们祈祷
‎-你说什么？

translation.en: Given the speed, climb, and turning radius of the Messerschmitt Bf 109--
translation.zh:
‎考虑到梅塞施米特Bf109战机的
‎速度、爬升能力和回转半径…

translation.en: I hope we won't need your sympathy, Mr. Mankiewicz.
translation.zh:
‎希望我们用不着你同情
‎曼奇维兹先生

translation.en: We'll do the praying and the fighting.
translation.zh: ‎我们自己会祈祷…还会战斗

translation.en: I will meet with Orson weekly. Keep him to date on our progress.
translation.zh:
‎我会每周和奥森见面
‎向他汇报我们的进度

translation.en: We're expecting great things.
translation.zh: ‎我们期待写出绝好的东西

translation.en: What is it the writer says? "Tell the story you know."
translation.zh:
‎那位编剧是怎么说的？
‎“说出你知道的故事”

translation.en: I don't know that writer.
translation.zh: ‎我不认识那位编剧

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: ‎喂

translation.en: Yes. Yes, he's right here.
translation.zh: ‎对 他在这

translation.en: Well, you should have everything. If I've forgotten, there's a clipboard.
translation.zh:
‎你需要的东西应该都有了
‎如果我忘了什么 这里有个剪贴板

translation.en: -Yes? Hello? -They're getting him.
translation.zh:
‎-是？喂？
‎-他们去找他了

translation.en: Our wunderkind does have the gift of theatrical timing.
translation.zh:
‎我们的神童确实有
‎把握戏剧时机的天赋

translation.en: Orson, hello. We just got in.
translation.zh: ‎奥森 你好 我们刚住进来

translation.en: -Hello. -Mank.
Houseman tells me we have you just where we want you.
translation.zh: ‎豪斯曼说我们把你抓住关起来了

translation.en: Lucky me.
translation.zh: ‎我真走运

translation.en: -How's the leg? -"Thigh bone's connected to the hip bone."
translation.zh:
‎-腿怎么样？
‎-“大腿骨连到了髋骨”

translation.en: Excellent. Ready and willing to hunt the great white whale?
translation.zh:
‎好极了 准备好了吗？
‎想猎杀大白鲸吗？

translation.en: Just call me Ahab. I understand we've 90 days.
translation.zh: ‎叫我亚哈船长 据我所知我们有90天

translation.en: Let's aim for 60.
translation.zh: ‎我们以60天为目标吧

translation.en: He's just cut a month.
translation.zh: ‎他刚刚砍掉了一个月

translation.en: I used to do it in five for you at the Mercury. This is leisurely.
translation.zh:
‎我以前在水星剧团
‎五天就给你写一本 这算轻松的

translation.en: -Sixty days, and then we can noodle. -Nothing like a good noodle.
translation.zh:
‎-60天 然后我们可以讨论
‎-那最好不过了

translation.en: Is the reason you lopped 30 days to run it past the RKO legal?
translation.zh:
‎你砍掉30天是为了给
‎雷电华公司法务部留时间审核吗？

translation.en: I thought I told you, Mank. I have final cut, final everything.
translation.zh:
‎我以为我跟你说过了
‎我有最终剪辑权 所有最终的定夺权

translation.en: There are no studio notes. We'll have no one but ourselves to blame.
translation.zh:
‎没有来自电影公司的反馈建议
‎好坏全由我们自己

translation.en: -Sixty days and a noodle. -Mr. Welles, we're ready.
translation.zh:
‎-60天 然后讨论
‎-我们准备好了

translation.en: Gotta run. I'm doing tests for Heart of Darkness.
translation.zh:
‎我要挂了
‎我要去《黑暗的心》的试镜了

translation.en: Little that, lesser Joe Conrad.
translation.zh: ‎就那个啊 约瑟夫康拉德的作品而已

translation.en: If anyone should ask, tell 'em you're adapting.
translation.zh: ‎如果有人问起 你就说你在改编

translation.en: You don't know this sun-bleached sewer here, my friend.
translation.zh: ‎你不了解这里阳光下的黑暗 朋友

translation.en: Break wind at Hollywood and Vine,
translation.zh: ‎在好莱坞藤街放个屁

translation.en: and a producer in Santa Monica reports a ruptured main.
translation.zh:
‎就会有圣莫尼卡的制片人
‎报告管道泄漏

translation.en: No, I don't know this burg, not yet.
translation.zh: ‎不 我还不认识你家的这个小镇

translation.en: I'm toiling with you in spirit, Mank. And I don't hear any typing.
translation.zh:
‎我在精神上与你共同努力 曼克
‎我没有听到打字声

translation.en: No notes.
translation.zh: ‎没有反馈建议

translation.en: And then he turns 24.
translation.zh: ‎然后他满24岁

translation.en: Trapped.
translation.zh: ‎被困住了

translation.en: Let me take off these clothes.
translation.zh: ‎我来帮你把衣服脱了

translation.en: They let me go just as I achieved perfect equilibrium.
translation.zh:
‎他们让我走
‎是因为我达到了完美的平衡

translation.en: I won't work with half the producers on the lot,
translation.zh: ‎工作室有一半制片人是我不想合作的

translation.en: and the other half won't work with me.
translation.zh: ‎而另一半不想和我合作

translation.en: -What's this, a racing form? -You stop reading, you stop learning.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么 赛马信息？
‎-停止阅读就是停止学习了

translation.en: Hold still.
translation.zh: ‎别动

translation.en: Lay back.
translation.zh: ‎躺下去

translation.en: Cigarette, please.
translation.zh: ‎请给我香烟

translation.en: Hermie, if a match gets near your breath, you'll burst into flames.
translation.zh: ‎你要是对着火柴吹气 都能喷火

translation.en: Even the dog's name is awful. Sounds like a Japanese houseboy.
translation.zh:
‎连狗的名字都很糟糕
‎听起来像日本男仆的名字

translation.en: You mark my words, Sara.
translation.zh: ‎记住我的话 莎拉

translation.en: The Wizard of Oz is gonna sink that studio.
translation.zh: ‎《绿野仙踪》会把公司搞砸

translation.en: Sleep. You're driving to New York tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎睡吧 你明天要开车去纽约

translation.en: Remember when you used to take the train from back East?
translation.zh: ‎记得你过去从东边乘火车吗？

translation.en: I'd sneak aboard in Albuquerque and climb into your compartment naked.
translation.zh:
‎我在阿尔伯克基偷偷上车
‎裸身爬进你的小车厢

translation.en: I also remember how I spent my honeymoon in Berlin,
translation.zh: ‎我还记得在柏林度蜜月的情景

translation.en: with hookers running up and down the stairs all night
translation.zh: ‎妓女们整晚在楼梯上跑上跑下

translation.en: because my dashing correspondent couldn't afford a nice hotel.
translation.zh: ‎因为我帅气的记者没钱住好旅馆

translation.en: -Weren't those the days? -Yeah, and the nights weren't bad either.
translation.zh:
‎-多美好的旧时光啊
‎-是啊 而且晚上也不赖

translation.en: -Schnutz? -For the last time, what?
translation.zh:
‎-史努兹？
‎-最后回答你一次 怎么了？

translation.en: -What year is it? -Herman…
translation.zh:
‎-今年是哪一年？
‎-赫尔曼…

translation.en: -I should have done something by now. -Hermie…
translation.zh:
‎-我现在应该已经有所成就了
‎-小赫…

translation.en: Give me a sign, oh, Lord.
translation.zh: ‎主啊 请给我指示吧

translation.en: I am as your servant Moses, though I won't work half as cheap.
translation.zh: ‎我可以做你的仆人摩西 但收费合理

translation.en: Go to sleep, meshuggener.
translation.zh: ‎睡吧 小傻瓜

translation.en: -Schnutz? -What?
translation.zh:
‎-史努兹？
‎-什么？

translation.en: Why do you put up with me?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么能忍受我？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: That bush in the front yard,
translation.zh: ‎前院的草丛

translation.en: if it catches fire tonight, you will let me know?
translation.zh: ‎如果今晚着火 你会告诉我吗？

translation.en: I mean, you know all kinds of things.
translation.zh: ‎你什么都懂

translation.en: Iambic pentameter, the words of the great poets.
translation.zh: ‎五步抑扬格、伟大诗人的诗句

translation.en: What about the way she signed it? "Always, Ethel."
translation.zh:
‎她署名的方式是怎么回事？
‎“永远的 埃塞尔”

translation.en: Can you beat that? Not just "Ethel," "Always, Ethel."
translation.zh:
‎你能写出比她更厉害的署名吗？
‎不止写埃塞尔 “永远的 埃塞尔”

translation.en: Tommy, if we can find civilization by sundown,
translation.zh:
‎汤米 如果日落前
‎我们能找到文明地区

translation.en: I hope to climb out of this crate and into a cold martini.
translation.zh:
‎我希望能爬出这台破车
‎来一杯冰马提尼

translation.en: She's not the kind to use "always" if she didn't mean it.
translation.zh: ‎她不会无故写“永远的”

translation.en: If she meant just "Ethel," she'd write just "Ethel," not "always."
translation.zh: ‎如果她只想签个名 就会写“埃塞尔”

translation.en: -Wouldn't you think? -The road, Tommy.
translation.zh: ‎看路 汤米

translation.en: I know. You read it. See what I mean.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 你读一下 就知道我的意思了

translation.en: She loves me, don't you think?
translation.zh: ‎她爱我 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Mank? It's Orson Welles.
translation.zh: ‎曼克？我是奥森威尔斯

translation.en: -Of course it is. -I think it's time we talked.
translation.zh:
‎-除了你还有谁？
‎-我觉得是时候谈谈了

translation.en: I'm all ears.
translation.zh: ‎我洗耳恭听

translation.en: Once a castle on a hill,
translation.zh: ‎从前山上的城堡

translation.en: now a memory of what once was.
translation.zh: ‎如今仅存于记忆之中

translation.en: Alone in his unfinished, already decaying pleasure palace,
translation.zh:
‎他独自待在
‎尚未建成就已衰败的宫殿中

translation.en: aloof, seldom visited, never photographed,
translation.zh: ‎清心寡欲 门可罗雀 从未留下照片

translation.en: we see an old man in a robe, smoking a pipe,
translation.zh:
‎我们看到
‎这位穿着浴袍的老人抽着烟斗

translation.en: sitting alone by his pool…
translation.zh: ‎独自坐在他的泳池边…

translation.en: discarded pages scattered at his feet.
translation.zh: ‎脚边散落着废弃的稿纸

translation.en: Narrator,
translation.zh: ‎旁白说

translation.en: "An emperor of newsprint continued to direct his failing empire,
translation.zh: ‎“报业大亨继续指导着他破败的帝国

translation.en: vainly attempting to sway, as he once did,
translation.zh: ‎徒劳地试图如往日一般呼风唤雨

translation.en: the destinies of a nation which had long since ceased to listen to him…"
translation.zh:
‎影响这个
‎早就不再听命于他的国度的命运…”

translation.en: No. "Had ceased to trust him."
translation.zh: ‎不 是“早就不再相信他”

translation.en: We see through trees as an aide pushes this old man in a wheelchair
translation.zh:
‎我们透过树林看到
‎一位助手推着这位轮椅里的老人

translation.en: across neatly groomed lawns.
translation.zh: ‎穿过修剪整齐的草坪

translation.en: Narrator, "There, last month,
translation.zh: ‎旁白说：“上个月

translation.en: as it must to all men, death came to--"
translation.zh: ‎对众生平等的死亡来到…”

translation.en: Let's have that cuppa, Mrs. A.
translation.zh: ‎我们喝杯茶吧 亚女士

translation.en: I know who it is.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你写的是谁

translation.en: Or… who it's meant to be.
translation.zh: ‎或者说…想写的是谁

translation.en: What makes you think it's meant to be anybody?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么觉得这写的是具体某个人？

translation.en: Come now.
translation.zh: ‎得了吧

translation.en: Everyone in the English-speaking world will recognize him instantly.
translation.zh: ‎所有说英语的人都认识他

translation.en: Exactly what he would say.
translation.zh: ‎完全就是他会说出口的话

translation.en: -Did you know the man? -Maybe.
translation.zh:
‎-你认识这个人吗？
‎-也许吧

translation.en: I used to.
translation.zh: ‎我以前认识他

translation.en: -You wrote for one of his papers? -No, praise God.
translation.zh:
‎-你为他的某份报纸供稿？
‎-没有 谢天谢地

translation.en: I met him after he started bankrolling his girlfriend's pictures.
translation.zh:
‎我是在他开始
‎赞助他女友的电影后认识他的

translation.en: You knew Marion Davies?
translation.zh: ‎你认识玛丽恩戴维斯？

translation.en: -If anyone did. -Really?
translation.zh:
‎-如果有人认识她的话 我算一个
‎-真的吗？

translation.en: What's she like?
translation.zh: ‎她是怎样的人？

translation.en: Why is it when you scratch a prim, starchy English schoolgirl,
translation.zh: ‎为什么当你挠了一个古板的英国女生

translation.en: you get a swooning moving-picture fan
translation.zh: ‎就能让她变成一个狂热的电影迷

translation.en: who's forgotten all she learned about the Battle of Hastings?
translation.zh:
‎把自己学的
‎黑斯廷斯战役的知识全忘了？

translation.en: Hastings. Fourteen October 1066,
translation.zh: ‎黑斯廷斯 1066年10月14日

translation.en: ten centigrade.
translation.zh: ‎10摄氏度

translation.en: Mank?
translation.zh: ‎曼克？

translation.en: Sorry. Somebody told me Mankiewicz was in here.
translation.zh: ‎有人说曼奇维兹在这里

translation.en: He is. I'm the promising brother, Joe.
translation.zh: ‎他在 我是他前途光明的弟弟 乔

translation.en: -I didn't know Herman had a brother. -Neither does anyone else.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道赫尔曼有弟弟
‎-其他人也不知道

translation.en: Let me guess. "There are millions to be made,
translation.zh: ‎我猜猜看 ‎“百万美金等你挣

translation.en: and your only competition is idiots," stop.
translation.zh: ‎你仅有的竞争对手都是傻子” 句号

translation.en: How did you know?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道？

translation.en: I hate to tell you, anyone who can rub three words together and make a sentence gets one.
translation.zh: ‎只要会用三个词造句的人都收到了

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: ‎走吧

translation.en: It's after lunch, and we're on a deadline. He may be busy.
translation.zh:
‎现在是午餐后时间
‎我们要赶着交稿子 他可能在忙

translation.en: -I promise I won't be a bother. -Not exactly what I meant.
translation.zh:
‎-我保证不会打扰大家
‎-我不是这个意思

translation.en: Come on! -Hey, you know I'm good for it. -Fellas.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托！你知道我可以的
‎-各位

translation.en: These are high stakes.
translation.zh: ‎赌注很大

translation.en: -Tails! That's it! -God damn it!
translation.zh:
‎-反面！就是这样！
‎-可恶！

translation.en: -Mank! -All right. Double or nothing.
translation.zh: ‎输了赔双倍 你这个宽眼睛的混蛋

translation.en: This time, banjo-eyed son of a bitch, let it hit the floor.
translation.zh: ‎输了赔双倍 你这个宽眼睛的混蛋 ‎扔硬币吧

translation.en: -Banjo eyes. -Son of a bitch…
translation.zh:
‎-“宽眼睛”
‎-混蛋？

translation.en: Mank once bet me a five-spot
translation.zh: ‎曼克曾经跟我赌一个巴掌的钱

translation.en: to see how long it would take a falling leaf to hit the ground.
translation.zh: ‎看一片落叶多久会落地

translation.en: -Had to go to management to cover it. -For five bucks?
translation.zh:
‎-我得找管理层要钱
‎-就为了五块钱？

translation.en: Five thousand.
translation.zh: ‎是五千

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: ‎来啊

translation.en: Heads, you bastard!
translation.zh: ‎正面 混蛋！

translation.en: Pleasure doing business with you, gentlemen.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴和你们做生意 先生们

translation.en: Hey, Charlie.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 查理

translation.en: Yeah. You all remember the Algonquin cabin boy, Charlie Lederer,
translation.zh:
‎对 你们都记得
‎阿冈昆的服务员吧 查理莱德勒

translation.en: a poor but somewhat talented magazine writer,
translation.zh: ‎一个可怜但有点才华的杂志作者

translation.en: come West to join our merry band?
translation.zh: ‎来到西边加入我们的团队

translation.en: -Well, you know most everyone. -Mr. Kaufman.
translation.zh:
‎-大部分人你都认识
‎-考夫曼先生

translation.en: George is fine, kid.
translation.zh: ‎叫我乔治就好 小子

translation.en: -Mr. Perelman. -Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
‎-佩尔曼先生
‎-很高兴见到你

translation.en: Do you prefer Sidney or S.J.?
translation.zh: ‎叫您希尼还是SJ？

translation.en: He takes what he gets. The great Charles MacArthur.
translation.zh:
‎叫什么都可以
‎伟大的查尔斯麦克阿瑟

translation.en: Good to see you again.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴又见到你

translation.en: My resident jack-of-all-trades, Shelly Metcalf.
translation.zh: ‎我的万能伙伴 雪莱麦特卡夫

translation.en: -Hey, kid. -Mr. Metcalf.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿
‎-麦特卡夫先生

translation.en: Save the "mister" for the anointed.
translation.zh: ‎把“先生”这种敬称留给救世主吧

translation.en: And last, not yet among them, my brother Joe.
translation.zh: ‎最后是尚未加入大家的乔 我弟弟

translation.en: Have Cyclone say, "I don't mind the heat as much as I do the humanity."
translation.zh:
‎旋风说
‎“比起高温 我更介意人类”

translation.en: And the one and only Ben Hecht.
translation.zh: ‎还有独一无二的本赫克特

translation.en: Have you been laid yet?
translation.zh: ‎你上过床吗？

translation.en: Do you have to think about that?
translation.zh: ‎你一定要想这个问题吗？

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: ‎喂

translation.en: Yeah. Right away.
translation.zh: ‎是 马上

translation.en: Selznick, everyone. Five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎是塞尔兹尼克 各位 五分钟后到

translation.en: You've arrived in the well-known nick.
translation.zh: ‎你来得正是时候

translation.en: Just in time for a story conference with the great David O.
translation.zh:
‎刚好可以
‎和伟大的大卫O一起开剧本会

translation.en: Once more unto the breach…
translation.zh: ‎让我们再试一次…

translation.en: Breach? Hell, unto the wire…
translation.zh:
‎再试一次？
‎说得轻巧 这是走钢丝啊…

translation.en: Without a net.
translation.zh: ‎还没有防护网

translation.en: Keep your mouth shut and watch us for your cue, okay?
translation.zh: ‎闭上嘴看我们给你的信号 明白吗？

translation.en: Cue?
translation.zh: ‎信号？

translation.en: What I wouldn't give to see that in a tight sweater.
translation.zh:
‎要是能看到那样的身材穿进紧身毛衣
‎要我做什么都可以

translation.en: Herm, can I use that?
translation.zh: ‎小赫 这句我能用吗？

translation.en: I need a status report.
translation.zh: ‎我要听进度报告

translation.en: Boys. Come on in.
translation.zh: ‎小子们 进来

translation.en: Make yourselves at home.
translation.zh: ‎别拘束

translation.en: Now, you all know Joe von Sternberg.
translation.zh: ‎你们都认识乔冯斯特恩伯格

translation.en: You wanted 72 hours, you got 72 hours. Tell us what you have so far.
translation.zh:
‎你们要72个小时 我就给了你们
‎72小时 跟我们说说现在进展如何

translation.en: Ben, why don't you start? Well, this was tough, David.
translation.zh:
‎-本 从你开始吧？
‎-这很难 大卫

translation.en: In the beginning, we couldn't agree on an approach.
translation.zh:
‎一开始 我们无法
‎在处理手法上达成一致

translation.en: Really? Why was that?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？为什么？

translation.en: Well, we see a different kind of Paramount picture.
translation.zh: ‎我们对派拉蒙影业的看法不同

translation.en: Different how?
translation.zh: ‎有何不同？

translation.en: Frankenstein and The Wolf Man all rolled into one, only--
translation.zh:
‎《科学怪人》和《狼人》
‎结合成一部影片…

translation.en: I don't make cheap horror pictures. Universal does.
translation.zh:
‎我不拍廉价恐怖电影
‎那是环球影业干的事

translation.en: This is different. This is about something.
translation.zh: ‎这不一样 这个有点内涵

translation.en: Okay…
translation.zh: ‎好吧…

translation.en: Sidney.
translation.zh: ‎希尼

translation.en: Imagine a mad scientist,
translation.zh: ‎想象一个疯狂的科学家

translation.en: touring the boonies with a mechanical freak he's fabricated.
translation.zh: ‎和他组装的机械怪人去荒郊野外旅行

translation.en: What does he mean, "fabricated"?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么意思？

translation.en: And displays it to superstitious hayseeds
translation.zh:
‎把它装在丝绸镶边的盒子里
‎给迷信的乡巴佬们展览看

translation.en: in a giant, silk-lined casket for the price of admission.
translation.zh:
‎把它装在丝绸镶边的盒子里
‎给迷信的乡巴佬们展览看 ‎收取门票钱

translation.en: But, every full moon, the monster awakens and raises unholy hell with the villagers.
translation.zh:
‎但每到满月之夜
‎怪兽就会醒来 侵扰村民

translation.en: Give it a Eastern European look.
translation.zh: ‎配上东欧风格的外貌

translation.en: Men in leather shorts, gals in tattered peasant blouses.
translation.zh:
‎穿皮短裤的男人
‎穿破烂农家上衣的年轻女孩

translation.en: -They think it's the devil? -Villagers always think it's the devil.
translation.zh:
‎-他们觉得那是恶魔？
‎-村民们一向会这样认为

translation.en: And the scientist and his creation are forced to flee during a raging electrical storm.
translation.zh:
‎科学家和他创造的怪物
‎被迫在雷电交加的暴雨中逃亡

translation.en: Flee from outraged peasants…
translation.zh: ‎逃离愤怒的农民们…

translation.en: Who pursue them mit torches…
translation.zh: ‎农民们举着火把搜寻…

translation.en: Overturn their creaky wagon…
translation.zh: ‎推倒了他们破旧的马车…

translation.en: And set fire to it.
translation.zh: ‎一把火烧了它

translation.en: Tell him about the finale, Charlie.
translation.zh: ‎跟他说说结尾 查理

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: ‎这个…

translation.en: the rain turns to sleet,
translation.zh: ‎大雨变成了冻雨 浇灭了大火

translation.en: puts out the fire, and entombs the monster in solid ice.
translation.zh: ‎大雨变成了冻雨 浇灭了大火 ‎而厚实的冰块也埋葬了怪物

translation.en: While, nearby, an old priest weeps.
translation.zh: ‎不远处 一位老牧师流下了泪水

translation.en: A weeping priest?
translation.zh: ‎哭泣的牧师？

translation.en: Thunder, lightning, blood, fire, religion…
translation.zh: ‎雷、电、血、火、宗教…

translation.en: All in one film?
translation.zh: ‎都放一部电影里？

translation.en: And with an unseasonal thaw,
translation.zh: ‎在反季节的冰雪消融后…

translation.en: a sequel.
translation.zh: ‎续集来了

translation.en: You said this was about something, this was different.
translation.zh: ‎你说这部作品会有内涵 会有所不同

translation.en: Plus, the ominous futility of man playing God.
translation.zh: ‎加上人类扮演上帝注定的悲剧与徒劳

translation.en: The Faustian bargain of life everlasting.
translation.zh: ‎浮士德式的换取长生不老的交易

translation.en: The triumph of the human spirit
translation.zh: ‎人性的胜利

translation.en: over the beast incarnate in our far-too-solid flesh.
translation.zh:
‎战胜我们
‎过于坚实的肉体里野兽的化身

translation.en: It's director-proof.
translation.zh: ‎什么导演都能拍好

translation.en: Joe.
translation.zh: ‎乔

translation.en: B picture.
translation.zh: ‎B级片

translation.en: It's not for Joe. Boys, this is serious. We need your help.
translation.zh:
‎这不是给乔的 小子们
‎这很严肃 我们需要你们的帮助

translation.en: We've got to get people into theaters, but…
translation.zh: ‎我们要让人们走进影院 可是…

translation.en: how?
translation.zh: ‎要怎么做？

translation.en: Show movies in the streets.
translation.zh: ‎在街头放电影

translation.en: You okay, Charlie? Taken care of this weekend?
translation.zh: ‎你还好吗 查理？这周末有安排了？

translation.en: -I'm going to see my aunt. -That sounds like fun.
translation.zh:
‎-我要去看望我的阿姨
‎-听起来会很有趣

translation.en: You obviously don't know my aunt. If you're not doing anything, come along.
translation.zh:
‎你显然不认识我阿姨
‎如果你没安排就一起来吧

translation.en: Careful, I just might.
translation.zh: ‎小心 我可能真会来

translation.en: Glendale station at 7:00. Bring Sara if you like.
translation.zh:
‎7点在格兰代尔站
‎你愿意的话可以带莎拉来

translation.en: -Who? -Sara, isn't that your wife?
translation.zh:
‎-谁？
‎-莎拉 她不是你妻子吗？

translation.en: Oh, you mean Poor Sara. No, she and the kids are back East.
translation.zh:
‎哦 你是说可怜的莎拉
‎不 她和孩子们还在东边

translation.en: Herman.
translation.zh: ‎赫尔曼

translation.en: Herman.
translation.zh: ‎赫尔曼

translation.en: -Herm! -Charlie!
translation.zh:
‎-赫尔曼
‎-查理！

translation.en: Cut! Next setup, please.
translation.zh: ‎停！请到下一个布景

translation.en: What is Mank doing here?
translation.zh: ‎曼克在这里做什么？

translation.en: -Who? -Herman Mankiewicz.
translation.zh:
‎-谁？
‎-赫尔曼曼奇维兹

translation.en: -Do I know him? -He wrote one of our Lon Chaneys.
translation.zh:
‎-我认识他吗？
‎-他写过一部我们朗钱尼主演的电影

translation.en: Mank!
translation.zh: ‎曼克！

translation.en: -Thalberg, the boy genius. -I am shocked to see you here.
translation.zh:
‎-萨伯格 青年才俊
‎-在这里看到你 我很惊讶

translation.en: I'd be shocked to see me here, too, Irving, if only I knew where here was.
translation.zh:
‎换做是我 我也会很惊讶 欧文
‎要是我知道这是什么地方的话

translation.en: -You wrote one of our Lon Chaneys. -Among many.
translation.zh:
‎-你写过一部朗钱尼主演的电影
‎-其中之一

translation.en: -Pictures? -Writers.
translation.zh:
‎-其中一部电影？
‎-其中一名编剧

translation.en: -At MGM, movies are a team sport, Mank. -Which may be why I'm at Paramount.
translation.zh:
‎-在米高梅 电影是团队合作
‎-这可能就是我去派拉蒙的原因

translation.en: Since when don't Paramount use writers by the truckload?
translation.zh:
‎派拉蒙什么时候开始
‎不用大批编剧了？

translation.en: But all at once, not in relays. Helps spread the blame around.
translation.zh:
‎但他们都是同时工作 不会接力进行
‎这有助于散播抱怨

translation.en: You remember our chairman, Louis B. Mayer?
translation.zh: ‎你认识我们的主席路易斯B梅耶吧？

translation.en: By reputation only.
translation.zh: ‎我只听过他的大名

translation.en: -Long night? -A short one. Plagued by spirits.
translation.zh:
‎-刚度过了漫漫长夜？
‎-挺短的 酒精让我睡过去了

translation.en: It's a hell of a way to spend the Sabbath, fellas.
translation.zh: ‎这种方式度过安息日可真糟糕 各位

translation.en: Here in support of a friend.
translation.zh: ‎我是来支持一位朋友的

translation.en: His leading lady is making a mid-career adjustment.
translation.zh: ‎他的女主角正在进行职业中期转型

translation.en: I'm on my way over. Any notes from the oversight tent?
translation.zh:
‎我要过去了
‎监督帐篷这里要发表任何意见吗？

translation.en: -Who was that again? -Just a writer.
translation.zh:
‎-那是谁来着？
‎-就是个编剧

translation.en: Slumming on a Saturday, Mr. Metcalf?
translation.zh: ‎屈尊在周六工作呢 麦特卡夫先生？

translation.en: Mank. No sir! Helping out on B camera.
translation.zh: ‎曼克 不 先生 我在给B镜头帮忙

translation.en: It's a home movie, but his idea of a home movie.
translation.zh: ‎这是家庭电影 是他认为的家庭电影

translation.en: I know you.
translation.zh: ‎我认识你

translation.en: Well, what's at stake here?
translation.zh: ‎这是演哪一出？

translation.en: We met at John Gilbert's birthday. You're Herman Mankiewicz.
translation.zh:
‎我们在约翰吉尔伯特的生日时见过
‎你是赫尔曼曼奇维兹

translation.en: Guilty.
translation.zh: ‎正是在下

translation.en: And I remember you, Miss Davies.
translation.zh: ‎我也记得你 戴维斯小姐

translation.en: Regaling us with stories about dodging trolley cars in Brooklyn.
translation.zh:
‎你给我们讲过
‎在布鲁克林躲避有轨电车的故事

translation.en: Your Flatbush was showing.
translation.zh: ‎展现出了你的法拉布什性情

translation.en: You fractured Wally Beery's wrist Indian wrestling.
translation.zh:
‎你在扳推角力中
‎折断了瓦力比瑞的手腕

translation.en: A lucky break.
translation.zh: ‎那是走运

translation.en: Boy, was he surprised. You're stronger than you look.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 他惊呆了 你比看起来要强壮

translation.en: And from what I understand, you're smarter.
translation.zh: ‎按我的理解来看 你比看起来更聪明

translation.en: That was a compliment.
translation.zh: ‎那是夸奖

translation.en: -See what I mean? -You are interesting.
translation.zh:
‎-我说的吧？
‎-你很有趣

translation.en: I need a favor, but promise you won't laugh.
translation.zh: ‎我需要帮忙 但你要保证你不会笑

translation.en: Given the state of the world, a tall order.
translation.zh: ‎考虑到世界的现状 这个要求很难

translation.en: I just know you are.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道你会笑

translation.en: I have got such a hangover right now, there's just a fighting chance I won't.
translation.zh:
‎我现在宿醉很严重
‎有那么一丝机会我可能不会笑

translation.en: I'm being burned at the stake and I am dying for a ciggie-boo.
translation.zh:
‎我被绑在柱子上就要烧死了
‎而我很想抽支烟

translation.en: There. God's punishing you.
translation.zh: ‎你看 上帝会惩罚你的

translation.en: Watch those stairs. They're treacherous.
translation.zh: ‎小心台阶 它们很危险

translation.en: Every moment of my life is treacherous.
translation.zh: ‎我人生的每分每秒都很危险

translation.en: Any last words?
translation.zh: ‎有遗言吗？

translation.en: Welcome to San Simeon.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到圣西米恩

translation.en: I've written worse.
translation.zh: ‎我写过更糟的台词

translation.en: -You've never seen it? -No, but George Bernard Shaw was right.
translation.zh:
‎-你从来没看过？
‎-没有 但是乔治伯纳萧说得对

translation.en: How's that?
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？

translation.en: "It's what God might've built had he had the money."
translation.zh:
‎“如果上帝有这笔钱
‎可能会造出这个东西”

translation.en: Well, as they say in the Bronx, "Make yourself to home," Mr. Mankiewicz.
translation.zh:
‎就像布朗克斯的说法
‎“宾至如归” 曼奇维兹先生

translation.en: -Or shall I call you Herman? -No. Please, call me Mank.
translation.zh:
‎-还是说我可以叫你赫尔曼？
‎-不 请叫我曼克

translation.en: -Good morning, Charles. -Charlie.
translation.zh:
‎-早上好 查尔斯
‎-查理

translation.en: -Aunt Marion. Mank. -You sleep well?
translation.zh:
‎-玛丽恩阿姨 曼克
‎-你睡得好吗？

translation.en: Until your rather dramatic wake-up call.
translation.zh: ‎在你戏剧性的叫醒服务之前都很好

translation.en: This is all Pops's idea. He wants me ready to take on the talkies.
translation.zh:
‎这都是老爹的主意
‎他要我准备好拍有声电影

translation.en: First positions, please!
translation.zh: ‎第一组位置 请准备

translation.en: Riders, ready!
translation.zh: ‎骑手 准备

translation.en: Rolling!
translation.zh: ‎开始摄像！

translation.en: -Speed. -Speed! Action!
translation.zh:
‎-快
‎-快！开始！

translation.en: Help! Please! Someone save me!
translation.zh: ‎救命！拜托！谁来救救我！

translation.en: Cut!
Pops, this is Herman Mankiewicz, but we have to call him Mank.
translation.zh:
‎老爹 这是赫尔曼曼奇维兹
‎但我们得叫他曼克

translation.en: Mankiewicz?
translation.zh: ‎曼奇维兹？

translation.en: Herman Mankiewicz, New York playwright and drama critic?
translation.zh:
‎赫尔曼曼奇维兹
‎纽约剧作家和戏剧评论家？

translation.en: Turned humble screenwriter. Mr. Hearst.
translation.zh: ‎现在是谦逊的编剧 赫斯特先生

translation.en: Why, no need to be humble, Mr. Mankiewicz. Pictures that talk are the future.
translation.zh:
‎为什么？不必谦逊 曼奇维兹先生
‎有声电影才是未来

translation.en: They're gonna need people who honor words, give them voice.
translation.zh:
‎他们需要尊重词句的人
‎为他们赋予声音

translation.en: There's a golden age coming
translation.zh:
‎黄金时代即将来临
‎整个世界都将成为舞台

translation.en: when all the world will be a stage, and you, perhaps, their Shakespeare.
translation.zh:
‎黄金时代即将来临
‎整个世界都将成为舞台 ‎你也许就是他们的莎士比亚

translation.en: I wouldn't have thought you'd be that keenly interested in the honoring of words.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到你对尊重词句这么有兴趣

translation.en: What's so funny?
translation.zh: ‎有什么好笑的？

translation.en: I'm just surprised that a vaunted muckraker like yourself
translation.zh:
‎我只是惊讶
‎像你这样备受追捧的打听丑闻的人

translation.en: sees Hollywood's future as such a shiny penny.
translation.zh: ‎竟如此看好好莱坞的未来

translation.en: Back to one.
translation.zh: ‎回到一号位置

translation.en: Times are changing, Mr. Mankiewicz,
translation.zh: ‎时代在改变 曼奇维兹先生

translation.en: and I'm not just referring to this Depression.
translation.zh: ‎我不只是在说大萧条

translation.en: All that bother.
translation.zh: ‎对你来说无所谓

translation.en: And when all this is over,
translation.zh: ‎这一切结束之后

translation.en: picture-makers are gonna have to service this new entertainment.
translation.zh: ‎电影制作人要为新式娱乐服务

translation.en: I intend to make pictures with the help of real literary minds.
translation.zh: ‎我想借助真正的文学头脑来拍电影

translation.en: I support that.
translation.zh: ‎我表示支持

translation.en: Instead, what do most studios give us? Gangster flicks, zanies.
translation.zh:
‎然而大部分电影公司给了我们什么？
‎帮派电影 滑稽电影

translation.en: Too true.
translation.zh: ‎太对了

translation.en: Now, how many gangsters do Americans meet in a lifetime?
translation.zh: ‎美国人一辈子能遇到几个黑帮？

translation.en: How many families are like the Marx Brothers?
translation.zh: ‎有多少家庭像马克思兄弟一样？

translation.en: You mean, besides my own?
translation.zh: ‎你是说除我自己的家庭以外？

translation.en: Very good. Have him seated next to me.
translation.zh: ‎很好 让他坐在我旁边

translation.en: Miss Davies, Mr. Hearst would like
translation.zh: ‎戴维斯小姐 赫斯特先生

translation.en: Mr. Mankiewicz seated to his left at dinner.
translation.zh: ‎想让曼奇维兹先生晚餐时坐在他左边

translation.en: Pops likes you.
translation.zh: ‎老爹喜欢你

translation.en: Why is it when Houseman edits,
translation.zh: ‎为什么豪斯曼修改后

translation.en: everyone ends up speaking like a constipated Oxford don?
translation.zh: ‎每个人说话都像个便秘的牛津学究？

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: ‎喂

translation.en: Yes, he is.
translation.zh: ‎对 他在

translation.en: No, not at all. Please hold on.
translation.zh: ‎不 没关系 请稍等

translation.en: It's Poor Sa-- I'm sorry. It's your wife.
translation.zh: ‎是可怜的莎…对不起 是你妻子

translation.en: -Schnutz. -I heard that.
translation.zh:
‎-史努兹
‎-我听到了

translation.en: Joe called four times in the last three days.
translation.zh: ‎乔在三天内打了四个电话

translation.en: -He wants your number up there. -So give it to him.
translation.zh:
‎-他想要你在那边的号码
‎-那就给他吧

translation.en: Knock it off!
translation.zh: ‎别闹了！

translation.en: The boys are remodeling.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们在改造房子

translation.en: He seemed concerned about something. Is everything okay?
translation.zh: ‎他好像在担心什么 一切都还好吗？

translation.en: If I could swim, I'd be doing swimmingly.
translation.zh:
‎如果我会游泳
‎我现在的状态就是如鱼得水

translation.en: And don't mind Joe. He's a worrisome old woman in disguise.
translation.zh:
‎别介意乔
‎他内里就是个爱操心的老女人

translation.en: Well, he wants to offer you work.
translation.zh: ‎他想给你工作做

translation.en: Baby Joe, offering me?
translation.zh: ‎小乔给我工作？

translation.en: If he calls again, give him this number.
translation.zh: ‎如果他再打电话 就把这个号码给他

translation.en: I've gotta run. Kiss the offspring.
translation.zh: ‎我要挂了 替我亲亲孩子们

translation.en: I say…
translation.zh: ‎要我说…

translation.en: a letter from the gallant lieutenant.
translation.zh: ‎这是一封来自英勇中尉的信

translation.en: Now, let's hope it makes more sense than the last.
translation.zh: ‎希望这封比上一封写得更通顺

translation.en: Fighters off the decks of aircraft carriers.
translation.zh: ‎战斗机离开航空母舰的甲板

translation.en: -Whoever had that idea? -It's not good?
translation.zh:
‎-谁想的这个主意
‎-不好吗？

translation.en: Not good?
translation.zh: ‎不好吗？

translation.en: German U-boats are starting to hunt in packs,
translation.zh: ‎德军的U型潜水艇开始成群出击

translation.en: and a Stuka dive-bomber can drop one down your stack from 500 feet.
translation.zh:
‎斯图卡俯冲轰炸机可以
‎从150米高空向你的谷堆投炸弹

translation.en: What's our valiant laddie have to say for the cause--
translation.zh: ‎我们英勇的小伙子要说什么…

translation.en: It's not from her husband.
translation.zh: ‎不是她丈夫写的

translation.en: His ship's been sunk off Norway.
translation.zh: ‎他的船在挪威被击沉了

translation.en: Presumed lost at sea.
translation.zh: ‎推测可能在海上失踪

translation.en: Always the smartest guy in the room.
translation.zh: ‎总是忙着抖机灵

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: ‎你说得对

translation.en: Aircraft carriers are a shitty idea, but I don't appreciate the callousness.
translation.zh:
‎航空母舰是个馊主意
‎但我不认同你的麻木不仁

translation.en: I expect more of you.
translation.zh: ‎我对你有更高的期待

translation.en: Presumed means they don't know, so I choose to believe he's alive until…
translation.zh:
‎据称意味着他们并不确定
‎所以我选择相信他还活着 直到…

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: Mr. Mankiewicz?
translation.zh: ‎曼奇维兹先生？

translation.en: He's all right. Just sleeping.
translation.zh: ‎他没事 只是睡着了

translation.en: Well… I shouldn't wonder.
translation.zh: ‎这个… ‎我早该猜到

translation.en: There's enough Seconal in those bottles to bring down a bull elephant in heat.
translation.zh:
‎酒里有足够的西可巴比妥
‎可以放倒一头发情的公象

translation.en: Young Orson doesn't believe in chance.
translation.zh: ‎年轻的奥森不相信概率

translation.en: Houseman, you sly thing. You slipped me a Mickey.
translation.zh:
‎豪斯曼
‎你这个狡猾的家伙 在酒里下药

translation.en: So we did.
translation.zh: ‎是的

translation.en: How you reached it so early in your rehabilitation,
translation.zh: ‎你在康复期间这么早就去找酒喝

translation.en: I cannot imagine.
translation.zh: ‎这是我没想到的

translation.en: How was it? Mother's milk?
translation.zh: ‎味道怎样？好酒吗？

translation.en: On balance, better than nothing. I plan to use it as a nightcap.
translation.zh:
‎总的来说 聊胜于无
‎我打算把它当作助眠饮品

translation.en: As you Yanks say, "He went out like a light."
translation.zh:
‎就像你们美国人说的
‎“他闪电般快速入睡”

translation.en: I couldn't have put it better myself, which may be why I write for the movies.
translation.zh: ‎我自己找不到更好的说法 亚女士 ‎可能正因如此 我只能给电影写剧本

translation.en: Will you stop?
translation.zh: ‎你能别再这么说了吗？

translation.en: You write for the movies because you're super at it.
translation.zh: ‎你给电影写剧本是因为你写得好

translation.en: Excuse me, you two, I've masses of typing to do.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 两位 我有很多打字工作要做

translation.en: Seventy-six pages.
translation.zh: ‎有76页

translation.en: By the time she translates your chicken scratch,
translation.zh: ‎等她翻译好你的鬼画符

translation.en: it'll be less than 40.
translation.zh: ‎就不到40页了

translation.en: At this rate, you'll never finish.
translation.zh: ‎照这个速度 你写不完

translation.en: What I wanna know is what you think of it.
translation.zh: ‎我想知道的是你对稿子的看法

translation.en: The writing is first-rate, but you know that.
translation.zh: ‎文笔当然是一流的 这你也知道

translation.en: His lust for power, your evocation of his hunger for love
translation.zh:
‎他对权力的渴望
‎他对爱的期盼在你笔下通过那些

translation.en: from those who fear his worst side, but-- The dreaded yet foreseeable "but."
translation.zh:
‎-惧怕他阴暗面的人展现 但是…
‎-可怕但又注定到来的“但是”

translation.en: You're asking a lot of a motion picture audience.
translation.zh: ‎你对电影观众的要求太高了

translation.en: -It's a bit of a jumble. -Did you say "jumble" or "jungle"?
translation.zh:
‎-有点杂乱
‎-你是说杂乱还是杂草？

translation.en: A hodgepodge of talky episodes.
translation.zh: ‎有声剧集的混乱杂糅

translation.en: Fragments that leap around in time like Mexican jumping beans.
translation.zh:
‎在时间线上四处跳跃的碎片
‎像墨西哥跳豆一样

translation.en: Welcome to my mind, old sock.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到我的大脑中 老家伙

translation.en: The story is so scattered, I'm afraid one will need a road map.
translation.zh:
‎故事太散了
‎观众需要路线图才能看懂

translation.en: -You mean it's a mess. -Would you consider simplifying?
translation.zh: ‎你是说故事很乱 ‎你能考虑简化一下吗？

translation.en: As Pascal once said,
translation.zh: ‎马克吐温曾说过

translation.en: "If only I'd had more time, I would have written a shorter letter."
translation.zh:
‎“要是我有更多时间
‎我会写一封更短的信”

translation.en: All I am saying is no one can write like that.
translation.zh: ‎我想说的是 没人能这样写东西

translation.en: But I can write like that, Houseman. I have.
translation.zh:
‎但我可以这样写 豪斯曼
‎我已经这样写了

translation.en: The narrative is one big circle, like a cinnamon roll,
translation.zh: ‎旁白就是个大圆圈 像肉桂卷一样

translation.en: not a straight line pointing to the nearest exit.
translation.zh: ‎不是通往最近出口的直线

translation.en: You cannot capture a man's entire life in two hours.
translation.zh:
‎你不可能在两个小时内
‎展现一个人的一生

translation.en: All you can hope is to leave the impression of one.
translation.zh: ‎你只能期望留下一个人的印象

translation.en: But nobody expects Shakespeare.
translation.zh: ‎没人指望看到莎士比亚式的作品

translation.en: People aren't spending their hard-earned 25 cents to see Macbeth.
translation.zh:
‎人们不会想要花辛苦挣来的25美分
‎去看《麦克白》的

translation.en: Maestro the Dog-Faced Boy did Macbeth.
translation.zh:
‎那个长着一张狗脸的大师
‎拍了《麦克白》

translation.en: Voodoo Macbeth. Don't be fooled. He's a showman.
translation.zh:
‎伏都教版《麦克白》
‎别被骗了 他是个马戏老板

translation.en: Busker reveling in sleight of hand.
translation.zh: ‎街头艺人投机取巧的狂欢

translation.en: Save yourself the trouble, be done in 60 days.
translation.zh: ‎别给自己找麻烦了 60天内完成

translation.en: He'll get this, and the audience will too. Stop worrying. Have a pickle.
translation.zh:
‎他会明白的 观众们也会
‎别担心了 吃点小菜

translation.en: No, thank you. I'm not hungry.
translation.zh: ‎不了 谢谢 我不饿

translation.en: Haven't been since we got here.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了之后就没饿过

translation.en: Cheerio.
translation.zh: ‎再会

translation.en: Write hard. Aim low.
translation.zh: ‎努力写 别好高骛远

translation.en: Where were we, chief?
translation.zh: ‎我们说到哪了 长官？

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
translation.zh: ‎你打算怎么办？

translation.en: -About what? -He's right.
translation.zh:
‎-什么怎么办？
‎-他说得对

translation.en: You won't be done till Christmas.
translation.zh: ‎你到圣诞节也写不完

translation.en: -What? -You made a promise.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-你承诺过了

translation.en: -I did what? -Sixty days is two weeks from now.
translation.zh:
‎-我什么过？
‎-两周后就是承诺的60天期限了

translation.en: Where were we?
translation.zh: ‎我们写到哪了？

translation.en: Bernstein's speech, the young woman on the ferryboat.
translation.zh: ‎伯恩斯坦的演讲 渡轮上的年轻女人

translation.en: Read it back, please.
translation.zh: ‎请读一下

translation.en: "A white dress she had on, and she was carrying a white parasol,
translation.zh: ‎“她身袭白裙 手举白伞

translation.en: and I only saw her for one second, and she didn't see me at all."
translation.zh:
‎我只瞧见她一瞬间
‎而她完全没看到我”

translation.en: "But I'll bet a month hasn't gone by since that I haven't thought of that girl."
translation.zh:
‎“但我打赌 自那以后
‎我没有哪个月不想着她”

translation.en: A snapshot from the Mankiewicz family album?
translation.zh: ‎曼奇维兹家庭相册里的一张照片？

translation.en: You might say that.
translation.zh: ‎你可以这么说

translation.en: It really is a gorgeous--
translation.zh: ‎真的很美…

translation.en: Spot to get stuck?
translation.zh: ‎被发现创作卡住很美？

translation.en: -Is Bernstein meant to be Louis Mayer? -If form follows function.
translation.zh: ‎伯恩斯坦是路易斯梅耶吗？ ‎形式服从功能

translation.en: Mayer is the same pathetic sort of lapdog to our Charles Foster?
translation.zh:
‎梅耶和我们的查尔斯福斯特一样
‎是条可怜的哈巴狗？

translation.en: Bernstein is a far nicer character.
translation.zh: ‎伯恩斯坦的角色比他好太多了

translation.en: You don't much like Mayer.
translation.zh: ‎你不怎么喜欢梅耶

translation.en: If I ever go to the electric chair, I'd like him to be sitting in my lap.
translation.zh:
‎如果我要坐电椅
‎我希望他坐在我大腿上

translation.en: Seven-fifty a week? That's half what you make, Herman.
translation.zh:
‎每周750美元？
‎这是你薪水的一半 赫尔曼

translation.en: -You're a junior writer, Joe. -So?
translation.zh:
‎-你是个初级编剧 乔
‎-所以呢？

translation.en: So, you're only half the wit your big brother is.
translation.zh: ‎你的智慧只达到你哥哥的一半

translation.en: -How many half-wits make that? -Herm, how do I look?
translation.zh:
‎-要几份智慧能赚到这么多钱？
‎-小赫 我看起来如何？

translation.en: -You look like you. Fine. -What should I be expecting?
translation.zh: ‎你看起来就是你自己的模样 还行 ‎我会走怎样的流程？

translation.en: You're related to me. He already thinks you're a genius.
translation.zh:
‎你是我的亲戚
‎他已经觉得你是个天才了

translation.en: Enough.
translation.zh: ‎够了

translation.en: The job will be yours if you can do two things.
translation.zh:
‎只要你能做到两件事
‎这份工作就是你的了

translation.en: One, don't roll your eyes. Two, try not to fall asleep.
translation.zh:
‎第一 不要翻白眼
‎第二 努力别打瞌睡

translation.en: This isn't Gower Gulch.
translation.zh: ‎这里不是高尔谷

translation.en: You want I should make a picture about a prostitute?
translation.zh: ‎我要拍一部关于妓女的电影？

translation.en: What's wrong with that? My mother was nothing but a whore.
translation.zh: ‎有什么问题？我母亲就是个妓女

translation.en: You would talk about your own mother that way?
translation.zh: ‎你这样说自己的妈妈？

translation.en: The woman who gave you life?
translation.zh: ‎给了你生命的女人？

translation.en: You ungrateful bastard! I ought to cut your balls off!
translation.zh:
‎你这个忘恩负义的混蛋！
‎我就该割了你的蛋！

translation.en: Do it, you fucking junk dealer! I'll still be the better man!
translation.zh:
‎来吧 你这个收废品的！
‎跟你比 我还是更高尚一些！

translation.en: L.B., this is my brother, Joe.
translation.zh: ‎梅耶 这是我弟弟 乔

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Joseph. I'm Louis Mayer.
translation.zh: ‎幸会 约瑟夫 我是路易斯梅耶

translation.en: I can't tell you what this means to him, Louis.
translation.zh:
‎我没法跟你说清楚
‎这对他来说意味着什么

translation.en: -They're all there, Mr. Mayer. -On my way. Joe, walk with me.
translation.zh:
‎-他们都到了 梅耶先生
‎-我就来 乔 和我一起走过去

translation.en: My boy, there are three work rules at this studio.
translation.zh: ‎我的孩子 这个公司有三条工作规则

translation.en: Rule number one, ars gratia artis-- art for art's sake.
translation.zh: ‎规则一：为艺术而艺术

translation.en: How you doing?
translation.zh: ‎你好吗？

translation.en: One million dollars a year we spend on stories we never even film.
translation.zh:
‎每年我们为
‎从不拍摄的剧本投入一百万美元

translation.en: Why not? I'll tell you. They don't make me cry.
translation.zh:
‎为什么没拍？我来告诉你
‎这些故事没能让我哭出来

translation.en: What makes me cry? Emotion.
translation.zh: ‎什么能让我哭出来？情绪

translation.en: Where do I feel emotion?
translation.zh: ‎我要如何感受到情绪？

translation.en: Here, here, and here.
translation.zh: ‎用这里、这里和这里

translation.en: Rule number two.
translation.zh: ‎规则二

translation.en: You may have heard MGM has more stars than the heavens.
translation.zh:
‎你可能听说过
‎米高梅的明星比天上还多

translation.en: Do not believe this.
translation.zh: ‎别信这个

translation.en: Hiya. We have only one star. That is Leo the Lion.
translation.zh:
‎你好 我们只有一个明星
‎就是狮子里欧

translation.en: Never forget that.
translation.zh: ‎永远不要忘记这一点

translation.en: Many stars have, and now they twinkle elsewhere.
translation.zh:
‎我们拥有过很多明星
‎但他们现在去别处闪耀了

translation.en: Rule number three…
translation.zh: ‎规则三…

translation.en: People think MGM stands for Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer.
translation.zh:
‎人们认为米高梅代表的是
‎米特洛-高文-梅耶

translation.en: It does not.
translation.zh: ‎不是的

translation.en: It stands for Mayer's gantze mishpokhe, Mayer's whole family.
translation.zh: ‎它代表的是梅耶的大家庭

translation.en: Never forget that.
translation.zh: ‎永远不要忘记

translation.en: You got a problem, come to Papa.
translation.zh: ‎有问题就来找爸爸

translation.en: This is a business where the buyer gets nothing for his money but a memory.
translation.zh: ‎这是门买家花钱只能买到回忆的生意

translation.en: What he bought still belongs to the man who sold it.
translation.zh: ‎他买的东西依然属于售卖它的人

translation.en: That's the real magic of the movies, and don't let anybody tell you different.
translation.zh:
‎这就是电影真正的魔力
‎别让其他人改变你的想法

translation.en: I find myself in a horrendous position, and I come to all of you on bended knee.
translation.zh:
‎我现在的处境很艰难
‎我在此恳求各位

translation.en: We are suffering, as all Americans are, from our country's terrible economic woes.
translation.zh:
‎我们现在和所有美国人一样
‎饱受我们国家经济灾难之苦

translation.en: Good people, everyday people, can't afford to go to the movies.
translation.zh: ‎普罗大众没钱看电影

translation.en: So even our preeminent dream factory…
translation.zh: ‎连我们优秀的梦工厂…

translation.en: is in grave financial difficulty.
translation.zh: ‎也陷入了糟糕的财务困境

translation.en: I am asking everyone in the MGM family to take a painful step.
translation.zh:
‎我恳请米高梅大家庭的每个成员
‎迈出艰难的一步

translation.en: I am asking to roll back salaries.
translation.zh: ‎我请求给各位降薪

translation.en: I don't want to,
translation.zh: ‎我不想这么做

translation.en: but for this hallowed place to continue to exist, I am forced to.
translation.zh:
‎但为了让这个神圣的地方继续存在
‎我不得不这么做

translation.en: I won't break up this family over something like money.
translation.zh: ‎我不会为了钱这种东西拆散这个家庭

translation.en: -How long are you asking for? -Shouldn't be long.
translation.zh:
‎-你希望降薪多久？
‎-不会很久

translation.en: How much are you asking for?
translation.zh: ‎要降薪多少？

translation.en: -Half. -Half?
translation.zh:
‎-一半
‎-一半？

translation.en: -Could be less. -Is everybody going to be pitching in?
translation.zh:
‎-也可以少一点
‎-所有人都要降吗？

translation.en: Are you, Mr. Mayer?
translation.zh: ‎你呢 梅耶先生？

translation.en: Real families root for each other in the good times,
translation.zh: ‎真正的家人在顺境中为彼此喝彩

translation.en: take care of each other in tough ones.
translation.zh: ‎在逆境中相互扶持

translation.en: We're with you, L.B.
translation.zh: ‎我们支持你 梅耶

translation.en: You may be, Mr. Barrymore,
translation.zh: ‎你也许会这么做 巴里摩尔先生

translation.en: but a 50% pay cut for grips and electricians--
translation.zh: ‎但降薪一半对器械师和电工来说…

translation.en: Eight weeks, my friends, eight short weeks.
translation.zh: ‎八周 我的朋友们 短短八周

translation.en: As soon as FDR reopens the banks, you'll get back every penny.
translation.zh:
‎一旦富兰克林罗斯福重新开放银行
‎你们就能拿回所有钱

translation.en: On that, you have the sacred word of L.B. Mayer.
translation.zh:
‎这一点你们可以
‎完全信任LB梅耶的承诺

translation.en: Well, I vote yes.
translation.zh: ‎我投赞成票

translation.en: -I do as well. -Me too.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 ‎还有我

translation.en: -How'd I do, Ben? -It was great, Mr. Mayer.
translation.zh:
‎-我表现如何 本？
‎-很好 梅耶先生

translation.en: Not even the most disgraceful thing I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎算不上我见过最可耻的事情

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
Yeah? Okay.
translation.zh: ‎这样？好

translation.en: Maybe a little bit left?
translation.zh: ‎或许往左去一点？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
Here?
-Yeah. -I've got to get typewriter ribbon.
translation.zh:
‎-这里？
‎-对 ‎我必须去买打字机色带了

translation.en: -Here are this morning's pages. -It's all dreck!
translation.zh:
‎-这是今早的稿子
‎-都是垃圾！

translation.en: Don't flagellate. At least you're writing.
translation.zh: ‎别自怨自艾 至少你在写

translation.en: None of it sings. None of it. Not a note.
translation.zh:
‎一句也唱不出来 一句也没有
‎一个音符都没有

translation.en: You're not writing opera.
translation.zh: ‎你不是在写歌剧

translation.en: Hello?
But I am writing an opera.
translation.zh: ‎但我写的就是歌剧

translation.en: It's for you.
translation.zh: ‎找你的

translation.en: -Yeah? -Herman, it's Joe.
translation.zh:
‎-喂？
‎-赫尔曼 我是乔

translation.en: Hey, kid. What's up?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 小子 你好吗？

translation.en: -Checking in. How are you getting around? -Gingerly.
translation.zh:
‎-就是问问你 你还好吗？
‎-战战兢兢

translation.en: -Any rest? -Haven't seen a sunrise yet.
translation.zh:
‎-休息得好吗？
‎-睡得昏天黑地

translation.en: You've never seen a sunrise.
translation.zh: ‎你就没在早上起过床吧

translation.en: -Sara said you wanted this number. -Just to hear your voice.
translation.zh:
‎-莎拉说你想要这个号码
‎-就想听听你的声音

translation.en: She said you had some work you wanted to talk about.
translation.zh: ‎她说你想聊聊某份工作

translation.en: I was thinking about that old play,
translation.zh:
‎我在考虑那部旧作
‎《婆罗洲的野人》

translation.en: The Wild Man of Borneo, that you wrote in the Ice Age.
translation.zh:
‎我在考虑那部旧作
‎《婆罗洲的野人》 ‎你在冰河世纪写的那部

translation.en: One never remembers one's disasters. It's considered gauche.
translation.zh:
‎谁也不会记得自己的拙作
‎那部写得很拙劣

translation.en: A play is never a disaster till the movies say it is.
translation.zh:
‎剧本在被拍成烂片之前
‎都称不上拙作

translation.en: I brought it to my people at the studio.
translation.zh: ‎我拿去给我公司的人看了

translation.en: We want W.C. Fields, and we want you to adapt.
translation.zh:
‎我们想让WC菲尔兹来拍
‎我们想让你改编

translation.en: I'm kind of on something right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在在忙别的事

translation.en: I can get you paid for the play and the adaptation.
translation.zh: ‎我可以让你的剧本和改编都获得报酬

translation.en: Sounds great, but I'll have to think about it.
translation.zh: ‎听起来不错 但我得考虑一下

translation.en: These things have their moment.
translation.zh: ‎过了这个村就没这个店了

translation.en: So, this isn't an offer. It's a subtle ultimatum.
translation.zh: ‎这不是商量 而是温和的最后通牒

translation.en: Nobody could ever tell you what to do.
translation.zh: ‎没人能对你下命令

translation.en: Did Sara put you up to this?
translation.zh: ‎是莎拉让你张罗的这件事？

translation.en: Not at all, but I know how things are. I can tell by her voice.
translation.zh:
‎不是 但我知道现状如何
‎从她的声音听得出来

translation.en: -And how bad is that, baby brother? -How bad?
translation.zh:
‎-有多糟呢 弟弟？
‎-有多糟？

translation.en: I went to a party last night
translation.zh: ‎我昨晚去了一个派对

translation.en: where Scott Fitzgerald referred to you as a ruined man.
translation.zh: ‎斯科特费兹杰拉德说你是个废人

translation.en: -That's how bad things can get. -That's good. I may use that.
translation.zh:
‎-事情就是可以这么糟糕
‎-很好 这个我可以拿来用

translation.en: Hermie--
translation.zh: ‎小赫…

translation.en: Please, stop, Joey. Just tell me what's on your mind.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 别绕弯子了 小乔
‎告诉我你的想法

translation.en: I hear you're hunting dangerous game.
translation.zh: ‎我听说你在做危险的事

translation.en: Word on the street is radio's golden boy wants to go toe-to-toe with Willie Hearst,
translation.zh:
‎流言说 电台的黄金男孩
‎想要和威利赫斯特正面较量

translation.en: and you're helping in the kitchen.
translation.zh: ‎而你在后场帮忙

translation.en: -And? -"And?"
translation.zh:
‎-然后呢？
‎-“然后呢”？

translation.en: Herman, "And?"
translation.zh: ‎赫尔曼 “然后呢？”

translation.en: How stupid of me.
translation.zh: ‎我真蠢

translation.en: I thought I was rejecting a humiliating handout,
translation.zh: ‎我以为自己在拒绝一个侮辱性的施舍

translation.en: when all the time, I was nixing a respectable bribe.
translation.zh:
‎结果一直以来
‎却是在拒绝一份高尚的贿赂

translation.en: And I'm sorry I ever cared.
translation.zh: ‎我的操心真是多余

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: ‎来吧

translation.en: Marion and I are so pleased you could all come stay for the weekend.
translation.zh:
‎你们能留下过周末
‎我和玛丽恩很高兴

translation.en: I hope the train ride wasn't too arduous.
translation.zh: ‎希望火车旅途没有太辛苦

translation.en: And tonight, we're celebrating our great friend's birthday
translation.zh: ‎今晚 我们要在我们小小的山间家宅

translation.en: in our little hillside home.
translation.zh: ‎庆祝我们好朋友的生日

translation.en: Charlie.
translation.zh: ‎查理

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: ‎祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: ‎祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Happy birthday, dear Louis
translation.zh: ‎祝你生日快乐 亲爱的路易斯

translation.en: Happy birthday to you
translation.zh: ‎祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Louis, you should be joyous. You don't look a day over 48.
translation.zh:
‎路易斯 开心点
‎你看起来完全没有48岁

translation.en: I feel 35.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉自己35岁

translation.en: Mr. Hearst, Marion, all of you,
translation.zh: ‎赫斯特先生 玛丽恩 各位

translation.en: my heart is full to bursting.
translation.zh: ‎我内心非常快乐

translation.en: I can't express in words…
translation.zh: ‎我无法用言语表达…

translation.en: Please don't try.
translation.zh: ‎拜托你别尝试

translation.en: W.R., nothing is more precious to me than your friendship and sage advice.
translation.zh:
‎威廉 没有什么
‎比你的友情和明智的建议更珍贵

translation.en: I am blessed to call you my friend.
translation.zh: ‎能有你做我的朋友 我很感恩

translation.en: God bless William Randolph Hearst.
translation.zh: ‎上帝保佑威廉兰道夫赫斯特

translation.en: God bless us, every one.
translation.zh: ‎上帝保佑我们 所有人

translation.en: -Hear, hear. -A very happy birthday, Louis.
translation.zh:
‎-说得好
‎-生日快乐 路易斯

translation.en: Our country should be flattered you picked its birth date as your own.
translation.zh:
‎你选了我们国家的诞辰做生日
‎它应该感到荣幸

translation.en: The rest of us have to be satisfied with the one we happened to be born on.
translation.zh:
‎我们其他人满足于
‎在出生那天过生日就好

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: Here's to your rich Canadian imagination.
translation.zh: ‎这一杯敬你丰富的加拿大想象力

translation.en: To rich Canadian imagination!
translation.zh: ‎丰富的加拿大想象力！

translation.en: Here's to banks reopening.
translation.zh: ‎再敬银行重新开放

translation.en: -And to freedom. -Freedom!
translation.zh:
‎-还有自由
‎-自由！

translation.en: I believe you've met our distinguished guest, Mr. Rexford Tugwell.
translation.zh:
‎大家一定已经见过我们尊贵的客人
‎雷克斯福德塔格威尔先生

translation.en: Now, Rex is special assistant to President Roosevelt.
translation.zh: ‎雷克斯是罗斯福总统的特别助理

translation.en: And we're all interested in what you might share with us.
translation.zh: ‎我们对你要分享的内容很感兴趣

translation.en: We all wanna welcome the Thalbergs
translation.zh: ‎我们要一起欢迎萨伯格一家

translation.en: back from Irving's long convalescence in Europe.
translation.zh:
‎欧文结束了漫长的欧洲康复之旅
‎回来了

translation.en: -Thank you, W.R. -Good to see you, Irving.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 威廉
‎-很高兴见到你 欧文

translation.en: -Thank you, Mr. Hearst. -Norma.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 赫斯特先生
‎-诺玛

translation.en: Anybody seen anything good lately?
translation.zh: ‎最近有谁看过什么好电影吗？

translation.en: I just saw 42nd Street. It blew my wig!
translation.zh: ‎我刚看过《第42街》 棒到飞起！

translation.en: You can take the girl outta Bed-Stuy.
translation.zh: ‎离开家乡也改不了说话的习惯

translation.en: -When was that? -Over the weekend.
translation.zh:
‎-什么时候看的？
‎-周末

translation.en: You were in D.C. I went to the pictures in Santa Barbara.
translation.zh:
‎你在华盛顿特区
‎我去了圣芭芭拉的电影院

translation.en: We have a fine screening room here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这里有放映室

translation.en: Warner's picture? Why waste money on that?
translation.zh: ‎华纳的电影？为什么要浪费钱去看？

translation.en: -Next time, I'll go with you. -Of course.
translation.zh:
‎-下次吧 我和你一起去
‎-好

translation.en: I am bonkers about Movietone News. I love Lowell Thomas's voice.
translation.zh:
‎我特别喜欢《有声电影新闻》
‎我爱罗威尔托马斯的嗓音

translation.en: Is he single?
translation.zh: ‎他单身吗？

translation.en: I sat across from him at the Brown Derby once.
translation.zh: ‎有一次在布朗德比餐厅 我坐他对面

translation.en: -He bought me a drink. -He didn't!
translation.zh:
‎-他给我买了杯酒
‎-不是吧！

translation.en: Not technically.
translation.zh: ‎严格来说不是

translation.en: But I made sure to run into him in the parking lot after.
translation.zh: ‎但我后来设法在停车场与他偶遇

translation.en: -I asked him, "Do you need a lift?" -You didn't! What did he say?
translation.zh:
‎-我问他：“需要搭车吗？”
‎-不是吧！他怎么说？

translation.en: -I'll never tell. -There's a point to this, dear?
translation.zh:
‎-我永远不会说出来
‎-你打算说什么来着 亲爱的？

translation.en: Well, yes, they showed that Hitler giving a speech, kissing babies.
translation.zh:
‎哦对 他们放映了
‎希特勒演讲、亲吻婴儿的影片

translation.en: He is creepers!
translation.zh: ‎他真吓人！

translation.en: Lederhosen and suspenders. Terrifying.
translation.zh: ‎皮短裤配背带 确实吓人

translation.en: No, it's the mustache that's the horror.
translation.zh: ‎不 吓人的是小胡子

translation.en: Don't be alarmed, Marion. He won't be around for long.
translation.zh: ‎别紧张 他不会活跃太久

translation.en: The Germans are a thoughtful, considerate people.
translation.zh: ‎德国人是一个周到体贴的民族

translation.en: Enough about Nazis.
translation.zh: ‎不聊纳粹了

translation.en: Irving, tell us about your travels. Where were you?
translation.zh:
‎欧文 跟我们说说你的旅行
‎你去了哪里？

translation.en: Berlin, in fact.
translation.zh: ‎其实我去了柏林

translation.en: But it was interesting.
translation.zh: ‎但挺有趣的

translation.en: Thugs in brown shirts goose-stepping past our hotel all night,
translation.zh:
‎穿棕色衬衣的暴徒
‎整晚迈着正步在我们酒店外经过

translation.en: screaming anti-Semitic slogans.
translation.zh: ‎喊着反犹口号

translation.en: I was terrified.
translation.zh: ‎我吓坏了

translation.en: This Hitler sounds like a drip.
translation.zh: ‎这个希特勒听起来像个窝囊废

translation.en: Shouldn't the United States do something, Mr. Tugwell?
translation.zh:
‎美国不需要做点什么吗
‎塔格威尔先生？

translation.en: We are weighing all options.
translation.zh: ‎我们在权衡各种选择

translation.en: Can't last. Who takes a lunatic like that seriously?
translation.zh:
‎折腾不了多久的
‎谁会把那样一个疯子当回事？

translation.en: The last time I looked, 40 million Germans.
translation.zh: ‎我上次查看的时候 有四千万德国人

translation.en: Mank! You're always so wonderfully contrary.
translation.zh: ‎曼克！你总是这样大唱反调

translation.en: "Chase & Sanborn's der coffee. Can 40 million Nazis all be wrong?"
translation.zh:
‎“切斯桑伯恩咖啡
‎四千万纳粹的选择会错吗？”

translation.en: I just read they've opened their first concentration camps
translation.zh:
‎我读到文章说
‎他们开设了第一个集中营

translation.en: and started burning books.
translation.zh: ‎并且开始焚烧书籍

translation.en: -What's next? Movies? -Enough.
translation.zh:
‎-接下来是什么？电影？
‎-够了

translation.en: -Is that true, Irving? -Yes, L.B.
translation.zh:
‎-是真的吗 欧文？
‎-是的 梅耶

translation.en: Hitler, Schmitler!
translation.zh: ‎希特勒 史密特勒！

translation.en: You don't turn your back on a market as big as Germany.
translation.zh: ‎不能忽视德国这么大的市场

translation.en: Please. It's upsetting enough Marion had to endure the man in newsreel.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 玛丽恩要忍耐新闻影片里的人
‎已经够让人难过了

translation.en: What's a concentration camp?
translation.zh: ‎什么是集中营？

translation.en: It was fascinating. Those people adore him.
translation.zh: ‎真神奇 那些人很喜欢他

translation.en: -I'm probably talking nonsense. -You're the first tonight that isn't.
translation.zh:
‎-我在胡说八道
‎-你是今晚第一个没有胡说八道的人

translation.en: Speaking of socialists, how about Sinclair's book?
translation.zh:
‎说到社会主义者
‎辛克莱的书怎么样？

translation.en: He wants to turn private enterprise over to the state.
translation.zh: ‎他想把私有企业上交给州政府

translation.en: There's one we won't be optioning.
translation.zh: ‎有一本书的版权是我们不会买的

translation.en: It's selling like crazy.
translation.zh: ‎它都卖疯了

translation.en: Walter Winchell says Sinclair may run for governor.
translation.zh: ‎沃特温切尔说辛克莱可能会竞选州长

translation.en: That rat Bolshevik belongs right up there with Hitler
translation.zh:
‎那个布尔什维克小人
‎和希特勒是一丘之貉

translation.en: on the list of people not to be taken seriously.
translation.zh: ‎不该被当一回事

translation.en: There's a world of difference between communism and socialism.
translation.zh: ‎共产主义和社会主义不同

translation.en: -They both want something for nothing. -Like a workforce for free?
translation.zh:
‎-他们都想不劳而获
‎-比如免费劳动力？

translation.en: Half, and only in the interim.
translation.zh: ‎是降半薪 而且是临时过渡

translation.en: It's safe to assume none of us here would welcome
translation.zh: ‎可以确认的是 我们没有人欢迎

translation.en: a crusading socialist as California's political savior.
translation.zh:
‎领导改革的社会主义者
‎成为加利福尼亚的政治救世主

translation.en: Certainly not FDR. Am I right, Rex?
translation.zh:
‎富兰克林罗斯福肯定不欢迎
‎对吗 雷克斯？

translation.en: Off the record, President says the man bears watching.
translation.zh:
‎这话不要外传
‎总统说这个人要留意观察

translation.en: Especially now that Republicans seem bent on running Frank Merriam again.
translation.zh:
‎特别是现在 共和党人好像下决心
‎要让弗兰克梅里亚姆再次竞选

translation.en: Sinclair's run twice before and got, what, 2% of the vote?
translation.zh:
‎辛克莱之前参加过两次竞选
‎得到多少来着？2%的票数？

translation.en: -Good people, the man is an author. -As was Thomas Jefferson.
translation.zh:
‎-朋友们 这人是个作家
‎-托马斯杰斐逊也曾是

translation.en: Come now, Mank. Upton Sinclair as Thomas Jefferson?
translation.zh:
‎得了吧 曼克
‎把厄普顿辛克莱比作托马斯杰斐逊？

translation.en: No, you're right, W.R.
translation.zh: ‎不 你说得对 威廉

translation.en: Jefferson never got federal laws passed to ban oil monopolies,
translation.zh:
‎杰斐逊从未让禁止石油垄断
‎和铁路信托的联邦法案得以通过

translation.en: the railroad trusts, or cleaned up the stockyards.
translation.zh: ‎也没打扫过牲口棚

translation.en: -He's an angry scribe, a provocateur. -Because he provokes thought.
translation.zh:
‎-他是愤怒的抄写员 一个煽动分子
‎-因为他会煽动思想

translation.en: You always side with the writer, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎你永远站在作家那一边 曼克

translation.en: Poor souls surviving a depression on five grand a week.
translation.zh:
‎可怜的人们在大萧条期间
‎每周靠五千美金生存

translation.en: -Commies. -L.B. is not wrong.
translation.zh:
‎-共产者
‎-梅耶没错

translation.en: Irving, you're a literate man.
translation.zh: ‎欧文 你是个学者

translation.en: You know the difference between communism and socialism.
translation.zh: ‎你知道共产主义和社会主义的区别

translation.en: In socialism, everyone shares the wealth.
translation.zh: ‎社会主义下 所有人分享财富

translation.en: In communism, everyone shares the poverty.
translation.zh: ‎共产主义下 所有人分享贫穷

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Mankiewicz.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 曼奇维兹先生

translation.en: Upton just wants you to apportion some of your Christmas bonus, Irving,
translation.zh: ‎厄普顿只想让你把你的圣诞奖金

translation.en: to the people who clean your house.
translation.zh: ‎分一点给帮你打扫房间的人

translation.en: Now, that's why I always want Mank around. Me too.
translation.zh:
‎-这就是我总喜欢让曼克来的原因
‎-我有同感

translation.en: Upton? Nobody's asking to hear you sing "The Internationale."
translation.zh: ‎厄普顿？没人要听你唱《国际歌》

translation.en: -What's that? -The Communist national anthem, darling.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么？
‎-共产主义者的国歌 亲爱的

translation.en: I would. Do you sing?
translation.zh: ‎我要听 你要唱吗？

translation.en: No one should have to hear me sing. Right, Sara?
translation.zh:
‎不该有人不得不听我唱歌
‎对吧 莎拉？

translation.en: If at all possible.
translation.zh: ‎如果你能唱的话

translation.en: As Republican state chairman-elect,
translation.zh: ‎和共和党州主席选举一样

translation.en: I'm telling you, nothing's going to happen here.
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你们 这里什么都不会发生

translation.en: The people who count in California won't let it.
translation.zh: ‎加利福尼亚的选民不会让这种事发生

translation.en: All this talk is so much pissing in the wind.
translation.zh: ‎这些废话真是浪费时间

translation.en: Nicely put.
translation.zh: ‎措辞真巧妙

translation.en: I heard Pops on the phone helping to pick the president's cabinet
translation.zh:
‎我听到老爹在电话里
‎帮忙挑选总统的内阁

translation.en: like casting a movie.
translation.zh: ‎就像为电影选角一样

translation.en: They can stop a guy like Sinclair.
translation.zh: ‎他们可以阻止辛克莱这样的人

translation.en: Couldn't you, Pops?
translation.zh: ‎对吧 老爹？

translation.en: Pardon.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: I don't know what I'm saying.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道自己在说什么

translation.en: Go.
translation.zh: ‎去吧

translation.en: Hello, Tokyo?
translation.zh: ‎喂 东京

translation.en: London, you there?
translation.zh: ‎伦敦 你在吗？

translation.en: Nerts!
translation.zh: ‎胡言！

translation.en: -What is that? -Pops's radio-phones.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么？
‎-老爹的无线电话

translation.en: Never ever be out of touch with your empire.
translation.zh: ‎永远不要和你的帝国失联

translation.en: No, what's "nerts"? Nerts is Brooklynese for "nuts."
translation.zh:
‎-不 我是问“胡言”是什么？
‎-胡言是布鲁克林话里胡扯的意思

translation.en: Jeepers!
translation.zh: ‎天啊！

translation.en: What did I do that was so terrible?
translation.zh: ‎我做了什么很糟糕的事吗？

translation.en: I shouldn't have said that about the cabinet in front of Tugwell,
translation.zh: ‎我不应该在塔格威尔面前提内阁

translation.en: but since when does anybody care what I have to say?
translation.zh:
‎可是从什么时候起
‎大家开始在意我说的话了？

translation.en: Those things just pop out of my mouth,
translation.zh: ‎我就这么顺嘴一说

translation.en: and the moment they do, I feel like…
translation.zh: ‎他们在意的那个时刻 我感觉…

translation.en: Like you got caught, jambes en l'air.
translation.zh: ‎就像被抓了现行 捉奸在床

translation.en: No!
Well, do you always just say whatever you think?
translation.zh: ‎嗯…你总是想到什么说什么吗？

translation.en: You're blushing.
translation.zh: ‎你脸红了

translation.en: -Am not. -Are, too.
translation.zh:
‎-我没有
‎-脸红了

translation.en: -Am not. -Are, too. I can see it even in the dark.
translation.zh:
‎-我没有
‎-脸红了 天色昏暗我都能看出来

translation.en: Well, what can I tell you, Mank? Marion Douras went to convent school.
translation.zh:
‎我能跟你说什么 曼克？
‎玛丽恩道拉斯上的是修道院学校

translation.en: Hedda! Louella!
translation.zh: ‎海达！卢埃拉！

translation.en: Where's a gossip columnist when you need one?
translation.zh:
‎八卦专栏作家
‎怎么在真正需要的时候都不见了？

translation.en: I hate shop talk. I never know what's going on.
translation.zh:
‎我讨厌公事谈话
‎我永远都搞不懂在说什么

translation.en: The one thing you never ever talk about is Upton Sinclair.
translation.zh: ‎绝对不能聊的就是厄普顿辛克莱

translation.en: I noted.
translation.zh: ‎记住了

translation.en: The moment he's mentioned, the evening turns.
translation.zh: ‎一旦提起他 一整晚的气氛就毁了

translation.en: -It's sort of a sore subject. -Really?
translation.zh:
‎-算是个惹人愤怒的主题
‎-是吗？

translation.en: Do tell.
translation.zh: ‎跟我说说

translation.en: I don't even know who this Mr. Sinclair is, but he wrote about us for a book.
translation.zh:
‎我连辛克莱先生是谁都不知道
‎但他写过一本关于我们的书

translation.en: I used to quote it word for word.
translation.zh: ‎我曾经一字一句引用过

translation.en: "I saw our richest newspaper publisher keep his movie mistress
translation.zh:
‎“我看到我们最有钱的报业出版商
‎把他的电影情妇

translation.en: in a private city of palaces and cathedrals,
translation.zh:
‎养在一座
‎充满宫殿和教堂的私有城池里

translation.en: furnished with shiploads of junk imported from Europe
translation.zh: ‎装点着大量从欧洲进口的垃圾

translation.en: and surrounded by vast acres reserved for use by zebras and giraffes,
translation.zh:
‎周遭是大片
‎供斑马和长颈鹿活动的场地

translation.en: telling in jest that he had spent six million dollars
translation.zh: ‎有人开玩笑说 他花了六百万美元

translation.en: to make his lady's reputation
translation.zh: ‎打造他情妇的名气

translation.en: and using his newspapers to celebrate her change of hats."
translation.zh: ‎用他的报纸为她庆祝换帽子这种事”

translation.en: It must be hard to be on the receiving end of that.
translation.zh: ‎阅读这些文字一定很难受

translation.en: People think because you're on the cover of Modern Screen, they know you.
translation.zh:
‎人们觉得因为你上了
‎《现代银幕》封面 他们就了解你

translation.en: Nerts! What do I have to complain about?
translation.zh: ‎胡言！我有什么可抱怨的？

translation.en: I live in a fishbowl, but anything I want is mine.
translation.zh:
‎我住在透明鱼缸里
‎但我想要的任何东西都属于我

translation.en: If I could, I'd share with everyone. You know that, Mank.
translation.zh:
‎如果可以的话 我愿意和大家分享
‎你知道的 曼克

translation.en: This Upton doesn't know a thing about the real…
translation.zh: ‎这个厄普顿完全不了解真实的…

translation.en: Nobody, but nobody, makes a monkey out of William Randolph Hearst!
translation.zh: ‎但没有人可以嘲弄威廉兰道夫赫斯特

translation.en: I understand why Mayer loathes him.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道梅耶为什么讨厌他
‎-为什么？

translation.en: -Why? -Sinclair caught him with his pants down.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道梅耶为什么讨厌他
‎-为什么？ ‎-辛克莱看到了他的丑态
‎-哎呀！

translation.en: Yikes!
translation.zh:
‎-辛克莱看到了他的丑态
‎-哎呀！

translation.en: He wrote that Mayer took a bribe to look the other way
translation.zh: ‎他曾写过 梅耶受贿后

translation.en: so a rival could buy MGM.
translation.zh: ‎默许一个竞争对手买下了米高梅

translation.en: -It's complicated. -Over my head?
translation.zh:
‎-很复杂
‎-是我不能理解的？

translation.en: No, over mine. You'd need a degree in larceny.
translation.zh:
‎不 是我不能理解的
‎你得有盗窃学位才能明白

translation.en: -Isn't bribery a crime? -That's what Sinclair said.
translation.zh:
‎-贿赂不是犯罪吗？
‎-辛克莱就是这么说的

translation.en: The little sausage might have gone to jail.
translation.zh: ‎小小的矮冬瓜可能要去坐牢了

translation.en: Jeepers!
translation.zh: ‎天啊！

translation.en: The hypocrisy.
translation.zh: ‎虚伪

translation.en: "Mayn gantze mishpokhe. My mishpokhe."
translation.zh: ‎“我的整个大家庭 我的大家庭”

translation.en: -I don't speak a lot of Jewish. -Really?
translation.zh:
‎-我不太会说犹太语
‎-是吗？

translation.en: "My mishpokhe. My family."
translation.zh: ‎“我的大家庭”

translation.en: Everything he does is for family,
translation.zh: ‎他做的一切都是为了家人

translation.en: except when it comes to selling his last name
translation.zh: ‎除了当他半夜把自己的姓氏

translation.en: to a competitor in the middle of the night.
translation.zh: ‎卖给竞争对手的时候

translation.en: He would do that to his own studio?
translation.zh: ‎他会这样对待自己的电影公司？

translation.en: He doesn't own MGM any more than Sam Goldwyn.
translation.zh: ‎他对米高梅的归属感还不如山姆高文

translation.en: They just run it for the moneyboys back East.
translation.zh: ‎他们只是为东边的有钱人经营它而已

translation.en: And jail is not something an animal like Mayer is likely to forget.
translation.zh:
‎监狱对梅耶这种货色来说
‎也不是会忘记的存在

translation.en: Irving must be clean. He looks like he shaves three times a day.
translation.zh:
‎欧文一定很干净
‎他看起来一天要刮三次胡子

translation.en: Well, there's clean, and there's clean.
translation.zh:
‎有卫生层面的清洁
‎也有人格层面的清洁

translation.en: Irving bought one of Sinclair's novels.
translation.zh: ‎欧文买下了辛克莱的一本小说

translation.en: Sinclair demanded a guarantee that not one word could be changed,
translation.zh: ‎辛克莱要他保证 一个字都不能改

translation.en: in writing, on the back of the purchase check.
translation.zh: ‎书面保证 写在购买支票的背面

translation.en: He didn't want notes from Irving Thalberg?
translation.zh: ‎他不想要欧文萨伯格的钱吗？

translation.en: When Thalberg refused, Sinclair took his money
translation.zh: ‎当萨伯格拒绝时 辛克莱带上他的钱

translation.en: and ran off to Mexico and financed a picture about the Russian Revolution.
translation.zh:
‎跑到墨西哥
‎资助了一部关于俄国革命的电影

translation.en: Now, that's sticking the old neck out.
translation.zh: ‎这就是冒险要付出的代价

translation.en: I'm sorry. Instinct!
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 这是本能！

translation.en: My fault.
translation.zh: ‎是我的错

translation.en: I've been a little sixes and sevens recently.
translation.zh: ‎我最近有点颠三倒四

translation.en: Tell me something, Mank. The truth.
translation.zh: ‎跟我说说 曼克 说实话

translation.en: Could you see me playing
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我能演

translation.en: Elizabeth Barrett Browning or Marie Antoinette?
translation.zh:
‎伊丽莎白巴雷特勃朗宁
‎或者玛丽安托瓦内特吗？

translation.en: Irving's bought 'em both. You know, because of Pops.
translation.zh:
‎两部电影欧文都买下来了
‎因为老爹的缘故

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么想？

translation.en: And honestly.
translation.zh: ‎要说实话

translation.en: I see you more as Dulcinea.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你更适合达辛妮亚

translation.en: -Who? -Dulcinea.
translation.zh:
‎-谁？
‎-达辛妮亚

translation.en: From the Spanish, for sweetness.
translation.zh: ‎是西班牙语 “甜心”的意思

translation.en: "Her hair, gold." "Her cheeks, roses."
translation.zh: ‎“金发飘飘 脸颊绯红”

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: ‎真好

translation.en: "Her lips, coral."
translation.zh: ‎“朱唇微启”

translation.en: "Her neck, alabaster." "Her bosom, marble."
translation.zh: ‎“颈白如瓷 酥胸如玉”

translation.en: Marble? Maybe once.
translation.zh: ‎如玉？也许曾经有过

translation.en: "Ivory, her hands, and her whiteness, snow."
translation.zh: ‎“纤指如牙白 肤透似粉雪”

translation.en: -You wrote that? -No. A fella named Cervantes.
translation.zh:
‎-这是你写的？
‎-不 是一个叫塞万提斯的人

translation.en: "There are meters of accent and meters of tone,
translation.zh: ‎“南腔北调的人 有来处也有去处

translation.en: but the best of all meters is to meet her alone."
translation.zh: ‎但最棒的就是与她独处”

translation.en: -A poem with a message. -That's just the first verse.
translation.zh:
‎-有暗示的诗句
‎-这只是第一篇

translation.en: The last?
translation.zh: ‎最后一篇

translation.en: "There are letters of accent and letters of tone,
translation.zh: ‎“南腔北调的人 要想得开也看得开

translation.en: but the best of all letters is to let her alone."
translation.zh: ‎但最棒的就是放她离开”

translation.en: Now, those, I wrote.
translation.zh: ‎这是我写的

translation.en: Do come in.
translation.zh: ‎进来吧

translation.en: Jesus! What is that? Sunlight. It's nearly noon.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊！那是什么？
‎-阳光 已经快中午了

translation.en: Mother of God! Where did the night go?
translation.zh: ‎老天爷啊！夜晚的时光去哪了？

translation.en: -Your support device is here. -Good. Send it in.
translation.zh:
‎-你的辅助设备到了
‎-好 送进来

translation.en: As is Mr. Houseman.
translation.zh: ‎豪斯曼先生也到了

translation.en: What would you like me to do?
translation.zh: ‎你希望我怎么做？

translation.en: Well, send him in, too.
translation.zh: ‎让他也进来

translation.en: Put it over there, please.
translation.zh: ‎请放在那边

translation.en: -You're early. -I thought we should talk.
translation.zh:
‎-你来早了
‎-我觉得我们该谈谈

translation.en: -Why are you wearing a coat? -I always wear a coat.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么穿外套？
‎-我一直穿外套

translation.en: Must be 108 degrees.
translation.zh: ‎一定都42摄氏度了

translation.en: We're at a Rubicon moment, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了关键时刻 曼克

translation.en: It's not the work. That's everything we hoped it would be.
translation.zh:
‎问题不在于作品
‎那完全符合我们的预期

translation.en: -Enough room there? -It should be.
translation.zh:
‎-空间够吗？
‎-应该够

translation.en: I'm sorry, John.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 约翰

translation.en: -You've only written 90 pages. -Ninety-one.
translation.zh:
‎-你只写了90页
‎-91页

translation.en: In my expert opinion, you're hardly out of the first act.
translation.zh:
‎以我的专业意见来看
‎你第一幕都还没写完

translation.en: I mean, how do you hope to be done in 14…
translation.zh: ‎你怎么可能在14…

translation.en: 13 days?
translation.zh: ‎13天内写完？

translation.en: We gave him our solemn word we would deliver.
translation.zh:
‎我们对他郑重承诺过
‎我们会按时交付

translation.en: -"We"? -I don't think he's going to take it well.
translation.zh:
‎-“我们”？
‎-我觉得他不会接受的

translation.en: You said 90 days. Welles said 60. I'm doing the very best I can.
translation.zh:
‎你说90天 威尔斯说60天
‎我在竭尽全力地写

translation.en: -We are surely to be axed. -Not just yet.
translation.zh:
‎-我们一定会被炒的
‎-暂时不会

translation.en: I've never been fired.
translation.zh: ‎我从没有被开除过

translation.en: -I've never not been fired. -I don't get fired.
translation.zh:
‎-我还没有不被开除的经历
‎-我不会被开除

translation.en: It's not as unpleasant as you might imagine.
translation.zh: ‎可能没有你想的那么糟糕

translation.en: You worry too much, John. What do you do for pleasure?
translation.zh:
‎你多虑了 约翰
‎你平时有什么消遣？

translation.en: Hello?
Yes, he's here.
translation.zh: ‎对 他在

translation.en: It's Orson.
translation.zh: ‎是奥森

translation.en: -Will you talk? -He'd like to speak with Mr. Houseman.
translation.zh:
‎-你要接吗？
‎-他想和豪斯曼先生说话

translation.en: Me?
Orson.
translation.zh: ‎奥森

translation.en: I came early to see where we were with…
translation.zh: ‎我早点过来看看我们的进度…

translation.en: No, not at all. Everything's going absolutely according…
translation.zh: ‎不 完全没有 一切都完全按计划…

translation.en: Well, that's difficult to say exactly.
translation.zh: ‎这个 很难准确地描述

translation.en: Yep. Yes, I know the clock…
translation.zh: ‎对 我知道时间…

translation.en: Well, as I've told you, it's quite unique.
translation.zh: ‎如我同你所说 很特别

translation.en: In fact, I'd say one of the most…
translation.zh: ‎其实我可以说是万里挑一…

translation.en: Yes, well, it will absolutely need your marvelous…
translation.zh: ‎对 那肯定需要你卓越的…

translation.en: He's on the mend and working tirelessly.
translation.zh: ‎他在恢复中 也在不知疲倦地工作

translation.en: Of course. When?
translation.zh: ‎当然 什么时候？

translation.en: I'm on my way. Yes. Hang on, he's right here.
translation.zh: ‎我这就去 ‎稍等 他就在这

translation.en: He wants to see me right away. Wouldn't tell me why.
translation.zh: ‎他想见我 还不告诉我为什么

translation.en: Perhaps he will you.
translation.zh: ‎也许他会跟你说

translation.en: Orson!
translation.zh: ‎奥森

translation.en: Tell me what's up, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎跟我说说怎么样了

translation.en: He's getting on my nerves.
translation.zh: ‎他搞得我心烦意乱

translation.en: I sensed that. I told him I had to see him.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉到了 我跟他说我得见他

translation.en: Hopefully, I can think of a reason before he gets here.
translation.zh: ‎在他来之前 我必须想出一个理由

translation.en: I've finished my test for Heart of Darkness.
translation.zh: ‎我完成了《黑暗的心》的试镜

translation.en: I'm turning my attention to our project.
translation.zh: ‎我现在全身心关注我们的小项目

translation.en: "Let there be light."
translation.zh: ‎“要有光”

translation.en: -Tell me what to expect. -I thought you'd want to be surprised.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我接下来会发生什么
‎-我以为你想保留惊喜

translation.en: You're always surprising. That's why you were my only choice.
translation.zh:
‎你总是出人意料
‎所以你才是我的唯一选择

translation.en: No one else is Mankiewicz. I can almost hear the finish line.
translation.zh:
‎没有第二个曼奇维兹
‎我仿佛都能听到最后一句话了

translation.en: -We're about to turn a corner. -Unto the breach!
translation.zh:
‎-我们就快迎来转机了
‎-让我们再试一次！

translation.en: Slim, you may tote those lovely highland beauties to the kitchen.
translation.zh:
‎斯里姆 你可以把这些
‎高地美人送到厨房去

translation.en: Fraulein Freda, empty the Mickeys
translation.zh: ‎弗里达小姐 把巴比妥的瓶子倒空

translation.en: and start replacing their contents. Raus. Schnell.
translation.zh: ‎换上内容 快点

translation.en: -Thank you, Slim. You may go. -Slim.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 斯里姆 你可以走了
‎-斯里姆

translation.en: Mr. Mankiewicz, please don't ask us to help you in this sad deception.
translation.zh:
‎请不要让我们帮你
‎完成这个可悲的骗术

translation.en: My dear Mrs. Alexander,
translation.zh: ‎我亲爱的亚历山大女士

translation.en: Charlie Lederer and I went to a great deal of trouble to engineer this sad deception.
translation.zh:
‎查理莱德勒和我
‎费了很大的周折设计这个可悲的骗术

translation.en: My deadline is two weeks away, and I intend--
translation.zh: ‎距离我的交期还有两周 而我想…

translation.en: It could mean our jobs.
translation.zh: ‎这会让我们丢掉工作

translation.en: I do my best thinking before I fall asleep.
translation.zh: ‎我在睡着之前努力思考

translation.en: And I am sick and tired of having my evenings end
translation.zh: ‎我厌倦且受够了每天晚上

translation.en: with the abrupt sensation of being struck on the head with a croquet mallet.
translation.zh:
‎在突然感觉
‎脑袋像被门球杆重锤一下之后入睡

translation.en: -A way to put it. -I'm not asking you to help.
translation.zh:
‎-随你怎么说吧
‎-我没有要你帮忙

translation.en: -You're not? -I am telling you.
translation.zh:
‎-没有吗？
‎-我说了

translation.en: I'm sorry. I won't be bullied. You'll have my resignation in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我不愿受欺侮
‎早上我会递上辞呈

translation.en: I know Fraulein Freda's been sneaking you nightcaps.
translation.zh: ‎我知道弗里达小姐偷偷给你睡前酒

translation.en: If she continues to cooperate in this cheap ruse,
translation.zh: ‎如果她继续配合这廉价的诡计

translation.en: I shall report the both of you.
translation.zh: ‎我会别无选择 只能告发你们

translation.en: -Fraulein Freda. -Ja, Herr Mank?
translation.zh:
‎-弗里达小姐
‎-是 曼克先生？

translation.en: -Please do as I instructed. -Ja, Herr Mank.
translation.zh:
‎-请按我说的做
‎-是 曼克先生

translation.en: You mustn't let him intimidate you.
translation.zh: ‎别理会他的威胁

translation.en: I'm not intimidated, Frau Alexander. Then, why?
translation.zh:
‎-我没有受威胁 亚历山大小姐
‎-那是为什么？

translation.en: Herr Mank sponsored my family's entry into this country.
translation.zh: ‎曼克先生资助我们全家入境这个国家

translation.en: He's responsible for us getting safely out of Germany, legally and financially.
translation.zh:
‎他在法律和财务方面
‎保障我们安全离开德国

translation.en: -Really? -Our entire village, he brought here.
translation.zh:
‎-真的吗？
‎-我们整个村子都被他带到这来了

translation.en: Entire village? Over 100 people.
translation.zh:
‎-整个村子？
‎-超过100人

translation.en: Joseph Goebbels, the propaganda minister,
translation.zh: ‎宣传部长约瑟夫戈培尔

translation.en: will not allow his films to be shown in the Fatherland.
translation.zh: ‎不允许他的电影在我们祖国上映

translation.en: I didn't realize.
translation.zh: ‎我没想到

translation.en: He wrote a picture about the Nazis which no studio anywhere will dare make.
translation.zh:
‎他写了一部关于纳粹的电影
‎没有公司敢拍

translation.en: I assume if he wishes to drink, he's a grown man, a good man,
translation.zh:
‎我觉得如果他想喝酒
‎他是个成年人 是个好人

translation.en: and should be treated as such.
translation.zh: ‎他就应该得到他想要的

translation.en: Nicht wahr?
translation.zh: ‎不是吗？

translation.en: To Mank-town. Or is it Mank-ville?
translation.zh: ‎敬曼克镇 还是曼克村？

translation.en: Dear Freda.
translation.zh: ‎弗里达啊

translation.en: What's German for blabbermouth?
translation.zh: ‎大嘴巴用德语怎么说？
