translation.en: Either you demonstrate you can handle this,
translation.zh: ‎除非你证明你可以处理好

translation.en: or we will all end up getting sacked.
translation.zh: ‎否则我们都要失业

translation.en: There's nothing like a vote of confidence from one's peers.
translation.zh: ‎同伴之间可没有什么信任投票

translation.en: To Mank-berg. Prosit.
translation.zh: ‎敬曼克堡 干杯

translation.en: Mank-heim. Bottoms up.
translation.zh: ‎曼克海姆 干杯

translation.en: Hey, Mank, you remember me?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 曼克 你记得我吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God. Of course I remember you, C.C.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天 我当然记得你 CC

translation.en: C.C. for Central Casting. How you been, Mank?
translation.zh: ‎选角部CC 你好吗 曼克？

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: ‎怎么回事？

translation.en: "What happened?" The goddamn Depression happened.
translation.zh: ‎“怎么回事？” 都怪该死的大萧条

translation.en: I ain't had so much as a walk-on since Tugboat Annie.
translation.zh:
‎《安妮号拖轮》之后
‎我就不怎么找得到龙套角色了

translation.en: Listen, I hate to, you know…
translation.zh: ‎我很不愿…

translation.en: Yeah. Ed, lend me a buck.
translation.zh: ‎好 艾德 借我一块钱

translation.en: Me and Grady here been thinking of bummin' east to Miami.
translation.zh:
‎我和这边这位格雷迪
‎想搭车向东去迈阿密

translation.en: I heard from someone the Hollywood studios are moving to Florida.
translation.zh:
‎我听说好莱坞的电影公司
‎要搬去佛罗里达了

translation.en: -Who told you that? -I can't say, but somebody in the know.
translation.zh:
‎-谁跟你说的？
‎-我不能说 知情人士

translation.en: In certain echelons, it's common knowledge.
translation.zh: ‎在某些阶层 这已经人尽皆知了

translation.en: Well, people in certain echelons
translation.zh: ‎某些阶层的人

translation.en: don't usually trust me with sensitive information.
translation.zh: ‎通常不会放心与我分享敏感信息

translation.en: But the studios aren't moving anywhere. That's company-town propaganda.
translation.zh:
‎但电影公司不会搬去任何地方
‎那是公司园区的宣传手法

translation.en: Believe what you want, but, say, you think you could spare…
translation.zh:
‎愿意信什么就信什么吧
‎你看能不能再…

translation.en: Ed?
translation.zh: ‎艾德？

translation.en: Bless you, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎祝你好运 曼克

translation.en: The bastard reneged. You were there.
translation.zh: ‎那个混蛋违约了 你也在场的

translation.en: Yes, he reinstated salaries, but he never gave back the money he promised.
translation.zh:
‎他恢复了工资
‎但从没有把承诺的钱还回来

translation.en: Giant surprise.
translation.zh: ‎大惊喜

translation.en: Come on, Mank. We need guys like you to keep people like Mayer honest.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 曼克 我们需要你这样的人
‎让梅耶这样的人守信用

translation.en: I'd refer you, for that, to the power of prayer.
translation.zh:
‎就这点来说
‎我推荐你借助祈祷的力量

translation.en: The Writers Guild doesn't have to hit the bricks for the $2,500-a-week guy.
translation.zh:
‎编剧工会没必要
‎为每周挣2500美元的人罢工

translation.en: We're doing it for the $250-a-week guy.
translation.zh: ‎我们是为了每周挣250美元的人

translation.en: Joe, all the $250-a-week writers I know are getting $2,500.
translation.zh:
‎我认识的每周挣250美元的编剧
‎都拿到了2500美元 乔

translation.en: Stop crying for your just deserts. They're liable to give them to you.
translation.zh:
‎别再为赢得的报酬哭泣了
‎不然他们会让你罪有应得

translation.en: Then we'll all be working for 75 bucks a week.
translation.zh: ‎那我们都得每周拿75美元干活

translation.en: I don't know if you've walked a picket line.
translation.zh:
‎你参与过罢工纠察线吗？
‎你可能应该去一下

translation.en: -You might have to. -And Dave Chasen will cater.
translation.zh:
‎你参与过罢工纠察线吗？
‎你可能应该去一下 ‎戴夫切森就能满足需求

translation.en: "Junior writers only paid $750 a week."
translation.zh: ‎“每周仅挣750美元的新手编剧”

translation.en: If that happens, you'd better run
translation.zh: ‎如果变成这样 你最好快点跑

translation.en: before real folk with real troubles stone you to death.
translation.zh: ‎不然真正麻烦的家伙会把你打死

translation.en: Hermie, the guild's in its infancy.
translation.zh: ‎小赫 工会刚刚创立

translation.en: -It needs you. -You're telling me.
translation.zh:
‎-它需要你
‎-你又知道了

translation.en: What writer failed to notice the Screen Writers Guild needs an apostrophe?
translation.zh:
‎什么样的编剧竟然注意不到
‎电影编剧工会的拼写里少一个撇号？

translation.en: As Groucho always said,
translation.zh: ‎正如格劳乔总是说

translation.en: "Never belong to any club that would have someone like you for a member."
translation.zh:
‎“永远不要加入任何一个
‎吸纳你这样的人为成员的俱乐部”

translation.en: And look at him.
translation.zh: ‎看看他

translation.en: The most miserable bastard on God's green earth.
translation.zh: ‎世界上最可悲的混蛋

translation.en: I'd tell him you said that, only he'd think you were brownnosing.
translation.zh:
‎我会告诉他你说的话
‎不过他会觉得你在阿谀奉承

translation.en: Close the door.
translation.zh: ‎关门

translation.en: Summer.
translation.zh: ‎夏天啊

translation.en: Inez, you are not to let the brothers Marx wait in my office.
translation.zh:
‎伊内兹 永远不要
‎让马克思兄弟在我办公室等

translation.en: They've been grilling hot dogs again.
translation.zh: ‎他们又在烤香肠了

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.zh: ‎坐吧

translation.en: You wanted to see me?
translation.zh: ‎你想见我？

translation.en: Not that I care, but why aren't you contributing to MGM's anti-Sinclair fund?
translation.zh:
‎虽然我不关心 不过你为什么
‎没有给米高梅的反辛克莱基金捐钱？

translation.en: Well, call me old-fashioned,
translation.zh: ‎你就当我老古董吧

translation.en: but I don't like being told which side of a fight I'm already on.
translation.zh:
‎但我不喜欢被告知
‎自己属于交战的哪一方

translation.en: How's it gonna look if the GOP chairman himself
translation.zh: ‎如果共和党主席得不到

translation.en: can't get unanimous support from his own studio?
translation.zh: ‎自己电影公司的一致支持 会怎样？

translation.en: You're serious.
translation.zh: ‎你是认真的

translation.en: I was taught by my parents
translation.zh: ‎我父母教育我要直截了当

translation.en: to be straightforward, to ask simply for what I want,
translation.zh:
‎我父母教育我要直截了当 ‎想要什么就要什么
‎准备好解释自己的立场

translation.en: and expect that I may have to elucidate my position.
translation.zh:
‎想要什么就要什么
‎准备好解释自己的立场

translation.en: I was encouraged by mine to use my imagination,
translation.zh: ‎我父母鼓励我运用自己的想象力

translation.en: but I taught myself to avoid the consequences.
translation.zh: ‎但我告诉自己要规避后果

translation.en: It's ten bucks, Mank. You piss that away between hopeless bets.
translation.zh:
‎就十美元 曼克
‎你在无望的赌局中就会挥霍掉

translation.en: I hate to think what L.B. might do if he knew you were the only holdout.
translation.zh:
‎我不愿去想当梅耶知道只有你
‎特立独行地没捐时 他会怎么做

translation.en: -I am, and he doesn't? -And we're not gonna tell him.
translation.zh:
‎-我就是特立独行 他不知道吗？
‎-我们不会告诉他

translation.en: -I could let you go for this. -It is a hanging offense.
translation.zh:
‎-我可以为这件事开除你
‎-这招足以给你判绞刑

translation.en: But I'll add the amount to your gambling debt and forget we ever had this conversation.
translation.zh:
‎我会把金额加在你的赌债上
‎然后忘记这段对话

translation.en: You do that… and the brand-spanking-new Writers Guild
translation.zh: ‎你试试看 ‎崭新的编剧工会

translation.en: might find it very interesting, not to mention the newspapers.
translation.zh:
‎可能会觉得这件事很有意思
‎更不用说新闻报纸了

translation.en: I'm not sure the guild intends to cover games of chance.
translation.zh: ‎我不确定工会是否要管辖赌博事宜

translation.en: And you won't go to the press, because in California, that means Hearst.
translation.zh:
‎你也不会去找媒体
‎因为在加利福尼亚 媒体就是赫斯特

translation.en: Irving, you are the shrewdest executive in this town.
translation.zh: ‎欧文 你是这里最精明的高管

translation.en: Why are you acting like some dumb ward heeler?
translation.zh: ‎为什么要做愚蠢的走狗？

translation.en: You don't need my donation.
translation.zh:
‎你不需要我的捐款
‎你不需要任何人的捐款

translation.en: You don't need anybody's. You have everything it takes right here.
translation.zh:
‎你不需要我的捐款
‎你不需要任何人的捐款 ‎这里有你需要的一切

translation.en: Meaning?
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？

translation.en: Meaning you can make the world swear King Kong is ten stories tall
translation.zh:
‎意思就是 你可以让所有人相信
‎金刚有十层楼高

translation.en: and Mary Pickford, a virgin at 40.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽碧克馥是个40岁的处女

translation.en: Yet, you can't convince starving voters that a turncoat socialist
translation.zh:
‎但你无法说服饥饿的选民们
‎一个变节的社会主义者

translation.en: is a menace to everything Californians hold dear?
translation.zh:
‎会对所有加州人
‎珍视的亲友构成威胁？

translation.en: You're barely trying.
translation.zh: ‎你根本没努力吧

translation.en: Millions of Californians are being taxed out of their homes,
translation.zh: ‎数百万加州人因重税流离失所

translation.en: yet the Depression is one of abundance.
translation.zh: ‎但大萧条的物资是充足的

translation.en: Fruit rots on the ground, and vegetables are dumped into the ocean
translation.zh: ‎水果烂在地里 蔬菜被扔进大海

translation.en: because there are no markets for them.
translation.zh: ‎因为它们没有市场

translation.en: Aimee Semple McPherson says you're a godless commie, Upton!
translation.zh:
‎艾梅欣普麦克弗森说
‎你是个不信神的共产主义者 厄普顿

translation.en: Too often, sir, the religion of Jesus is used by the ruling classes
translation.zh:
‎先生 统治阶级过多地利用
‎对耶稣的宗教信仰

translation.en: to keep themselves in power and the poor ever poorer.
translation.zh: ‎保证自己掌权 而穷人则更穷

translation.en: And that, my friends, is a sin and an error.
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友们 这是原罪 是错误

translation.en: I say, with Thomas Jefferson,
translation.zh: ‎我和托马斯杰斐逊说

translation.en: "Truth has nothing to fear from error where reason is left free to combat it."
translation.zh:
‎“只要留有理智与错误抗衡
‎真理就不会惧怕错误”

translation.en: My friends, income in this country
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友们 这个国家的收入

translation.en: is going to be redistributed by one of two methods,
translation.zh: ‎会在两个方法之中选其一进行再分配

translation.en: legal enactment or violent revolution.
translation.zh: ‎法律制定或暴力革命

translation.en: We haven't much longer to exercise our choice.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有多少时间做选择了

translation.en: Thank you all for coming.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢大家的到来

translation.en: Tell us about Hollywood!
translation.zh: ‎跟我们说说好莱坞！

translation.en: Are the studios really moving to Florida like they've been saying?
translation.zh:
‎电影公司会像他们说的那样
‎搬去佛罗里达吗？

translation.en: Absurd, sir.
translation.zh: ‎很荒谬 先生

translation.en: If they were serious, why have the brothers Warner broken ground
translation.zh:
‎如果他们是认真的
‎为何华纳兄弟破土动工

translation.en: on an additional 100,000 square feet of sound stages,
translation.zh: ‎新建了九千多平方米的摄影棚？

translation.en: while MGM has the most contracts with stars in their history?
translation.zh:
‎而米高梅签约的明星数量
‎达到历史新高

translation.en: Well, he may not get Mayer's vote, but he gets mine.
translation.zh:
‎-他也许得不到梅耶的选票…
‎-工作会留在这里… ‎-…但我会投他
‎-…留在加州

translation.en: …in California.
translation.zh:
‎-…但我会投他
‎-…留在加州

translation.en: Thank you all for coming.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢大家的到来

translation.en: Well, I have seen some miracles in my day, but I have over 200 pages in 13 days.
translation.zh:
‎我在我的时代见证过一些奇迹
‎但你在13天内完成了200页

translation.en: I never thought it possible.
translation.zh: ‎我以前从来没想过能完成

translation.en: To support devices. Support devices.
translation.zh:
‎-敬辅助设备
‎-辅助设备

translation.en: It's good, Mank. Damn good.
translation.zh: ‎很好 曼克 非常好

translation.en: I have it on highest authority it's the best thing he's done.
translation.zh:
‎可靠分析
‎这是他到目前为止最好的作品

translation.en: As a moving picture, it's more than good.
translation.zh: ‎作为电影来说 它非常好

translation.en: I'm at a loss to even express how wealth and influence can crush a man.
translation.zh: ‎我无法表达财富和影响力对人的摧毁

translation.en: It's Lear. The dark night of the soul.
translation.zh: ‎这是《李尔王》 灵魂的暗夜

translation.en: And I was completely mistaken.
translation.zh: ‎我之前完全误解了

translation.en: The shifting point of view is revolutionary.
translation.zh: ‎观点的变化简直是革命性的

translation.en: I never thought one could care so much about a sled.
translation.zh:
‎我从没想过
‎有人竟然会那么在意一个雪橇

translation.en: It's kind of you to say.
translation.zh: ‎你这么说真贴心

translation.en: But.
translation.zh: ‎但是

translation.en: "But," again.
translation.zh: ‎“但是” 又来了

translation.en: It's 327 pages. An embarrassment of riches.
translation.zh: ‎它有327页 多到不知道怎么删

translation.en: When the Dog-Faced Boy gets here, there will be branches to prune.
translation.zh:
‎等那个狗脸小子到了这里
‎就要修枝剪叶了

translation.en: "A far too long screenplay for the ages." John Houseman.
translation.zh:
‎“对年长者来说过于冗长的剧本”
‎约翰豪斯曼

translation.en: I built him a watertight narrative and a suggested destination.
translation.zh:
‎我为他打造了严密的叙事
‎和建议性的终点

translation.en: Where he takes it, that's his job.
translation.zh: ‎要如何拍摄 那是他的工作

translation.en: I was looking to get you paid.
translation.zh: ‎我想让你拿到报酬

translation.en: I don't know if you were aware or not.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你是否知道

translation.en: You signed your rights to the Mercury. You agreed not to take screen credit.
translation.zh:
‎你签名放弃了自己的权利
‎不能对剧本署名

translation.en: -I needed the work. -You may want to reconsider.
translation.zh:
‎-我需要这份工作
‎-你可能应该重新考虑一下

translation.en: All I currently want is a real shower, a cocktail, and my Sara to wake up to.
translation.zh:
‎我现在只想好好冲个澡
‎喝杯鸡尾酒 躺在我的莎拉身边睡觉

translation.en: Are you certain?
translation.zh: ‎你确定吗？

translation.en: It worked out.
translation.zh: ‎之前行得通的

translation.en: Mank, if I may be so bold, why Hearst?
translation.zh:
‎曼克 我大胆问一句
‎为什么写赫斯特？

translation.en: Lord knows, outside his own blonde Betty Boop,
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道
‎除了他的金发版贝蒂宝宝

translation.en: you were always his favorite dinner partner.
translation.zh: ‎你一直是他最爱的晚餐同伴

translation.en: John, are you familiar with the parable of the organ grinder's monkey?
translation.zh:
‎约翰 你熟悉“街头艺人的猴子”
‎这个寓言吗？

translation.en: Today, our roving reporter is visiting Mrs. Elsie Hammontree of Azusa.
translation.zh:
‎今天 我们的流动记者
‎要拜访阿祖瑟的艾希哈门特雷女士

translation.en: Elsie, would you mind telling the folks at home why you're voting Republican?
translation.zh:
‎艾希 告诉在家的听众们
‎你为什么要投票给共和党

translation.en: Young man, I'm a widow,
translation.zh: ‎年轻人 我是个寡妇

translation.en: and this little home may not be much, but it's all I have left.
translation.zh:
‎这个小家也许没有多少东西
‎但它是我拥有的全部

translation.en: -And I intend to protect it. -Poor old woman.
translation.zh:
‎-我想保护它
‎-可怜的老妇人

translation.en: Would you mind telling the folks why you're voting for Frank Merriam?
translation.zh:
‎告诉在家的听众们
‎你为什么投票给弗兰克梅里亚姆

translation.en: Well, I'm voting for Frank Merriam because I wanna keep our way of life.
translation.zh: ‎因为我想保持我们的生活方式

translation.en: I know that voice.
translation.zh: ‎我认识这个声音

translation.en: It is familiar.
translation.zh: ‎很熟悉

translation.en: That's Maude Anderson.
translation.zh: ‎那是莫得安德森

translation.en: It is. Aunt Bertha from Lonely Trails.
translation.zh: ‎是的 《孤独踪迹》里的博萨阿姨

translation.en: Well, she's no widow. And she's absurdly rich.
translation.zh: ‎她可不是寡妇 而且富得流油

translation.en: That "poor old woman" has got enough oil wells south of El Segundo
translation.zh:
‎那个“可怜的老妇人”
‎在埃尔塞贡多南部的油井够多

translation.en: to buy us both, Schnutz.
translation.zh: ‎可以买下我们两个 史努兹

translation.en: I'd know that whiskey gargle anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎她的声音到哪我都能听出来

translation.en: Hey, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 曼克 ‎（终结加州的贫困 选辛克莱州长）

translation.en: Looks like you found work, C.C.
translation.zh: ‎看来你找到工作了 CC

translation.en: Don't nose it around, but yeah, just in the nick.
translation.zh:
‎不要四处打听
‎不过你说得对 时机正好

translation.en: -Who's hiring? -MGM.
translation.zh:
‎-谁雇了你？
‎-米高梅

translation.en: They cleaned out the Washington and Culver gates like a dose of Ex-Lax.
translation.zh:
‎他们把华盛顿街和卡夫街的大门
‎清扫干净 就像用了泻药一样

translation.en: Grady gets a speaking part.
translation.zh: ‎格雷迪要演讲

translation.en: They told us to come dressed as we are.
translation.zh: ‎他们让我们穿自己的衣服来

translation.en: I don't know who thought of it, but it keeps a lot of us off the streets.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道是谁想出来的
‎但这让我们很多人离开了街头抗议

translation.en: Don't forget to vote.
translation.zh: ‎别忘了投票

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: He's confused with Sinclair Lewis.
translation.zh: ‎别人把他和辛克莱路易斯搞混了

translation.en: So many hicks think he wrote Elmer Gantry, it's cost him the Dust Bowl vote.
translation.zh:
‎很多乡巴佬以为他写了《孽海痴魂》
‎这让他失去了风沙侵蚀区的选票

translation.en: I'm in.
translation.zh: ‎我下注

translation.en: Poor sap. Not only has he got no money,
translation.zh: ‎可怜的傻瓜 他不仅没钱

translation.en: he's an idealist, for Christ's sakes.
translation.zh: ‎还是个理想主义者 老天爷啊

translation.en: Talk about political handicaps. I'm out.
translation.zh: ‎真是政治低能 我放弃

translation.en: Times says he'll lose by 200,000.
translation.zh: ‎《洛杉矶时报》说他会亏损20万

translation.en: It's amazing what $10 million against him bought.
translation.zh:
‎用来反对他的一千万美元
‎可以买到多少东西啊

translation.en: Raise.
translation.zh: ‎加注

translation.en: That's what he gets for surrounding himself with amateurs.
translation.zh: ‎这就是他和业余人士合作的下场

translation.en: They not only charge admission to rallies, they pass a plate once suckers are inside.
translation.zh: ‎他们对集会收费 ‎在傻瓜们入场后传递盘子收钱

translation.en: Call.
translation.zh: ‎跟注

translation.en: He's the most famous schlub after FDR, Hitler, and Mussolini.
translation.zh:
‎他是继富兰克林罗斯福
‎希特勒和墨索里尼之后又一个蠢材

translation.en: That ought to count for something.
translation.zh: ‎他们一定有自己的价值

translation.en: -Hiya, Shell, sit in. -The bookies know.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 雪莱 出牌了
‎-赌徒们都懂

translation.en: Soon as Maude's radio spots started running,
translation.zh: ‎一旦莫得的广播片段开始播放

translation.en: the odds went from 7-5 for to 2-1 against.
translation.zh: ‎赔率就从7比5到了2比1

translation.en: Could you effete political snobs please shut up and play?
translation.zh:
‎你们这些无能的政治小人
‎能不能闭嘴玩牌？

translation.en: Mank, can I talk to you?
translation.zh: ‎曼克 我们能聊聊吗？

translation.en: I'll see you guys and bump you two big ones.
translation.zh: ‎我要跟这一注 给你们两百块

translation.en: It's important.
translation.zh: ‎很重要的事

translation.en: What? Now, Shelly?
translation.zh: ‎现在 雪莱？

translation.en: It better be.
translation.zh: ‎最好真的重要

translation.en: That's the first good hand I've had all day.
translation.zh: ‎我今天才第一次有好手气

translation.en: I didn't know he knew what a good hand looked like.
translation.zh:
‎我并不知道
‎他原来知晓这样做情形会如何

translation.en: I'm out.
translation.zh: ‎我放弃

translation.en: Mind telling us who you favor in this fall's election?
translation.zh: ‎今年秋季的选举你更属意谁？

translation.en: -I'm going to vote for Frank Merriam. -Mind telling us your principal reason?
translation.zh: ‎我要投票给弗兰克梅里亚姆 ‎告诉我们你投他的主要原因

translation.en: Well, I want Merriam because I want a job.
translation.zh: ‎我选梅里亚姆是因为我想要工作

translation.en: If you drive all the capital out of the country, who'll pay us?
translation.zh:
‎如果把资本都赶出这个国家
‎谁来付钱给我们？

translation.en: So, you think Merriam would be safest for all of us?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得梅里亚姆
‎对我们来说是最安全的？

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: ‎当然

translation.en: It's no time to trade horses in the middle of a stream.
translation.zh:
‎在车水马龙之中
‎可不是买卖马匹的时候

translation.en: Are you going to vote in the coming election?
translation.zh:
‎巴特勒先生
‎接下来的选举你会投票吗？

translation.en: -I most certainly am. -Who would you vote for?
translation.zh: ‎我当然会 ‎你会投给谁？

translation.en: -I'm sure I'm gonna vote for Mr. Sinclair. -You must have a good reason to.
translation.zh:
‎-我肯定会投给辛克莱先生
‎-你一定有充分的理由

translation.en: Well, Mr. Sinclair got something new. He got that EPIC Plan.
translation.zh:
‎辛克莱先生有新的想法
‎他有那个终止加州贫困的计划

translation.en: And I feel as though it's time we should try something new out again.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们是时候尝试新事物了

translation.en: I need prosperity.
translation.zh: ‎我需要繁荣

translation.en: Well, first of all, I'm an American,
translation.zh: ‎首先 我是个美国人

translation.en: and I believe that Mr. Merriam will support all the foundations and principles
translation.zh:
‎我相信梅里亚姆先生会支持
‎这个国家在过去150年

translation.en: that this country has stood for in the past 150 years.
translation.zh: ‎坚守的根基和原则

translation.en: I have a job now, and I wanna keep it.
translation.zh: ‎我有工作 我想保住它

translation.en: My wife and I love California, and we'd like to stay.
translation.zh:
‎我和我妻子爱加利福尼亚
‎我们想留下

translation.en: But in case we should have to leave, I'd like to have at least a couple dollars.
translation.zh:
‎但如果我们不得不离开
‎我希望能得到一些钱

translation.en: Cut.
translation.zh: ‎停

translation.en: Mrs. Hammontree, mind telling the folks why you're voting for Frank Merriam?
translation.zh:
‎哈门特雷女士 告诉听众们
‎你为什么投票给弗兰克梅里亚姆

translation.en: Well, I'm voting for Frank Merriam because I wanna keep our way of life.
translation.zh: ‎因为我想保持我们的生活方式

translation.en: You don't believe a Democrat would protect your way of life?
translation.zh: ‎民主党无法保护你的生活方式？

translation.en: Why, that man's a socialist.
translation.zh: ‎那个人是个社会主义者

translation.en: I don't know much about politics, but I do know this.
translation.zh: ‎我不太懂政治 但这个我还是知道的

translation.en: If Upton Sinclair wins this election,
translation.zh: ‎如果厄普顿辛克莱胜选

translation.en: private ownership in California won't amount to a hill of beans.
translation.zh: ‎加利福尼亚的私有制就一文不值了

translation.en: Well, we need complete rejuvenation of our system,
translation.zh: ‎我们的系统需要彻底复兴

translation.en: so I vote for Comrade Upton.
translation.zh: ‎所以我投给厄普顿同志

translation.en: His system work in Russia, why not here?
translation.zh:
‎他的体系在俄国能成功
‎为什么在这里不行？

translation.en: Cut. Do it again.
translation.zh: ‎停 再来一次

translation.en: What'd you think?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得如何？

translation.en: Truthfully, Shelly, if the performances were any better,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 他们要是表演得再逼真些

translation.en: you'd be ashamed of yourself.
translation.zh: ‎你就该有负罪感了

translation.en: Only half of 'em were actors.
translation.zh: ‎他们中只有半数是演员

translation.en: It's got that raw newsreel feel, hasn't it?
translation.zh:
‎有那种粗犷的
‎新闻影片的感觉 是不是？

translation.en: -But it isn't news, and it isn't real. -I wasn't looking to have a debate.
translation.zh:
‎-但它不是新闻 也并不真实
‎-我不是来做道德辩论的

translation.en: -When did they cook this up? -At a meeting in production.
translation.zh:
‎-他们什么时候做的这个？
‎-在一次制片会上

translation.en: They were passing around a pamphlet Sinclair wrote called "Ending Poverty in California."
translation.zh:
‎他们传看了一份辛克莱写的传单
‎“终结贫困…”

translation.en: "America's unemployed will invade the Golden State."
translation.zh: ‎“美国的失业者会入侵黄金之州”

translation.en: -Mayer was giddy to use it against him. -Yeah, I bet he was.
translation.zh:
‎-梅耶激动地想用这点反击他
‎-我猜也是

translation.en: It's enough to persuade me that a writer is more of a menace
translation.zh:
‎这足以说服我相信
‎对不会怀疑的大众来说

translation.en: to an unsuspecting public than a party hack.
translation.zh: ‎一个编剧比搞党派的人更危险

translation.en: Manky--
translation.zh: ‎曼克…

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: ‎你没事吧？

translation.en: Just nerves.
translation.zh: ‎只是压力大吧

translation.en: If it's bothering you, Shelly, why get involved?
translation.zh:
‎如果这让你感到苦恼 雪莱
‎为何还要参与？

translation.en: They gave me a chance to direct.
translation.zh: ‎他们给了我导演的机会

translation.en: You don't think anyone old enough to vote's gonna buy this shit?
translation.zh:
‎你不会觉得到法定投票年龄的人
‎会信这种鬼东西吧？

translation.en: Only the ones who believe King Kong is ten stories tall
translation.zh: ‎只有相信金刚有十层楼高的人

translation.en: or Mary Pickford a virgin at 40.
translation.zh:
‎或者相信玛丽碧克馥
‎是40岁处女的人会信

translation.en: Thanks, Cedric. These are fine.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 塞德里克 这些没问题

translation.en: I've just watched our Sinclair films.
translation.zh: ‎我刚看了我们的辛克莱影片

translation.en: What did you think?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得如何？

translation.en: Well, with all due respect to Shelly, King Kong, they ain't.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言
‎雪莱的影片比《金刚》差远了

translation.en: Though I do think footage
translation.zh: ‎但我确实觉得

translation.en: of invading hobos has a certain xenophobic power
translation.zh:
‎外来移民劳工入侵的影片
‎登上《洛杉矶时报》头版

translation.en: when front-paged in the Times and backed by those tacky billboards.
translation.zh:
‎背面是俗气的广告牌时
‎会有一定的恐惧外国人效应

translation.en: Shelly got a chance to direct, and I canceled your $12,000 gambling debt.
translation.zh:
‎雪莱得到了导演的机会 而你的
‎一万两千美金赌债被我一笔勾销了

translation.en: I'd call that a fair return on a one-minute lecture
translation.zh:
‎我觉得这是
‎对关于平凡电影公司高层的

translation.en: for uninspired studio chieftains.
translation.zh: ‎一分钟演讲的合理回击

translation.en: Your director's been stricken with a bout of conscience.
translation.zh: ‎你的导演正在遭受良心的谴责

translation.en: I'm sure he'll tell me himself.
translation.zh: ‎我相信他会自己告诉我

translation.en: Don't do this, Irving.
translation.zh: ‎别这样 欧文

translation.en: When I was just a boy, passing out socialist leaflets in the Bronx,
translation.zh:
‎我小时候在布朗克斯
‎派发社会党传单的时候

translation.en: a couple Tammany goons came to show me the error of my ways.
translation.zh:
‎几个坦慕尼协会的傻子
‎来告诉我我做错了

translation.en: One of them crushed my testicles
translation.zh: ‎其中一个揍了我的睾丸

translation.en: until I volunteered to distribute my wares into the East River.
translation.zh: ‎直到我自愿把我的货物撒到东河里

translation.en: That's politics. I didn't invent it, I don't apologize for it.
translation.zh:
‎那就是政治 不是我发明的
‎我不会为此道歉

translation.en: Mayer's not paying for this.
translation.zh: ‎梅耶不会为此买单

translation.en: He never pays for anything.
translation.zh: ‎他从不为任何事买单

translation.en: Willie?
translation.zh: ‎威利？

translation.en: -Marion might be interested. -Well, you're gonna have to hurry.
translation.zh:
‎-玛丽恩可能会有兴趣
‎-那你要抓紧时间了

translation.en: Mayer's over there now, giving her the company kiss-off.
translation.zh: ‎梅耶要让她和公司说再见了

translation.en: Haven't you heard?
translation.zh: ‎你没听说吗？

translation.en: She's taking her playpen to Warner Bros.
translation.zh: ‎她要带着她的宝宝围栏去华纳兄弟了

translation.en: Permanently.
translation.zh: ‎不再回来

translation.en: -Warner's? -I wouldn't let her do Marie Antoinette.
translation.zh: ‎华纳？ ‎我没让她演玛丽安托瓦内特

translation.en: Goldwyn's right for once. "A comedienne in that role is to laugh."
translation.zh:
‎高文终于做了件对的事
‎“喜剧演员演这个角色就是要笑”

translation.en: Besides, her pictures haven't made a dime in a decade.
translation.zh: ‎另外 她的电影十年来一分钱也没赚

translation.en: Congratulations, Irving.
translation.zh: ‎祝贺你 欧文

translation.en: I know what I am, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我是怎样的人

translation.en: When I come to work, I don't consider it slumming.
translation.zh: ‎我不认为工作是体验生活

translation.en: I don't use humor to keep myself above the fray.
translation.zh: ‎我不会用幽默让自己远离冲突

translation.en: I go to the mat for what I believe in.
translation.zh: ‎我愿意为自己坚信的东西打持久战

translation.en: I haven't the time to do otherwise.
translation.zh: ‎我从未选过其他行事方式

translation.en: But you, sir,
translation.zh: ‎而你 先生

translation.en: how formidable people like you might be if they actually gave at the office.
translation.zh:
‎你这样的人如果在职场上真正努力
‎该有多强大

translation.en: Close the door.
translation.zh: ‎把门关上

translation.en: Mank! Are you okay?
translation.zh: ‎曼克！你没事吧？

translation.en: No, that almost killed me. Where's Willie?
translation.zh: ‎有事 我都快死了 威利在哪？

translation.en: Cairo, I think.
translation.zh: ‎我想应该在开罗

translation.en: -Can you phone him? -I don't phone him, he phones me.
translation.zh:
‎-你能打电话给他吗？
‎-我没给他打过电话 都是他打给我

translation.en: When's he due back?
translation.zh: ‎他什么时候回来？

translation.en: After November 6th. I'm joining him in Europe next week.
translation.zh:
‎11月6日之后
‎我下周要和他一起去欧洲

translation.en: Marion, I need a favor. It's just a little joke on Willie.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽恩 我需要你帮我个忙
‎就是和威利开个小玩笑

translation.en: Sure, Mank, anything.
translation.zh: ‎当然 曼克 什么忙都可以

translation.en: I want you to go back and tell Mayer
translation.zh: ‎我希望你回去告诉梅耶

translation.en: Willie wants the phony Sinclair films pulled.
translation.zh: ‎威利希望撤掉辛克莱的虚假影片

translation.en: Which phony Sinclair films?
translation.zh: ‎什么虚假影片？

translation.en: There isn't time to explain. I just need you to tell him that.
translation.zh: ‎没时间解释了 我需要你跟他说

translation.en: I couldn't, not even as a joke.
translation.zh: ‎我不能 开玩笑也不行

translation.en: -Why not? -You know I don't lie.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-你知道我不会说谎

translation.en: And that's why he'd believe you.
translation.zh: ‎所以他才会相信你

translation.en: Marion, please, you're not in convent school anymore.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽恩 拜托
‎你已经不是修道院学校的学生了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I know it's silly, but-- -But what? Why not?
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 我知道很蠢 但是…
‎-但是什么？为什么不行？

translation.en: -Promise you won't laugh. -I promise I won't laugh.
translation.zh:
‎-你保证不会笑
‎-我保证不会笑

translation.en: -My exit. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-我的离开
‎-什么？

translation.en: I already made my exit.
translation.zh: ‎我已经卷铺盖离开了

translation.en: -Manky! -Whatie?
translation.zh:
‎-曼克！
‎-怎么？

translation.en: It's an ash-throated flycatcher! Congratulations. Best kind.
translation.zh:
‎-是灰喉蝇霸鹟！
‎-恭喜你 最棒的品种

translation.en: What can I say? She's my aunt.
translation.zh: ‎我能说什么？ ‎她是我阿姨

translation.en: It's not about her, it's about him.
translation.zh: ‎这不是她的故事 是他的故事

translation.en: -Or rather, it's him, but it's not her. -It isn't?
translation.zh:
‎-或者说 他是他本人 而她不是
‎-不是吗？

translation.en: The lonely showgirl, trapped in a castle, doing jigsaw puzzles.
translation.zh: ‎孤独的歌舞女郎 困在城堡里玩拼图

translation.en: It's more her as people who don't know her imagine her to be.
translation.zh:
‎她的形象更多的是
‎不了解她的人想象她的样子

translation.en: I see.
translation.zh: ‎我明白了

translation.en: It's her as they imagine her, but it's him as you knew him.
translation.zh:
‎她是大众想象中的她
‎而他是你认识的那个他

translation.en: -Damn it, Charlie. -You asked me out here.
translation.zh:
‎-该死 查理
‎-是你叫我来这儿的

translation.en: I was honored to come and read your latest.
translation.zh: ‎我很荣幸读到了你的最新作

translation.en: -Is this a test? -A test? Of what?
translation.zh:
‎-这是测试吗？
‎-测试？测试什么？

translation.en: -Friendship? Loyalty? -Come now.
translation.zh:
‎-友谊？忠诚？
‎-得了吧

translation.en: Or just your way of avoiding responsibility?
translation.zh: ‎还是你推卸责任的方法？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？

translation.en: Are you hoping I might absolve you of such a personal betrayal?
translation.zh:
‎你希望我宽恕你
‎这种个人背叛的行为吗？

translation.en: I won't give you that.
translation.zh: ‎我不会的

translation.en: Are you going to say anything?
translation.zh: ‎你有什么要说的吗？

translation.en: -I have to think about it. -Why?
translation.zh: ‎我需要想一想 ‎为什么？

translation.en: I haven't made up my mind how she might react.
translation.zh: ‎我还没有想好她会如何反应

translation.en: What does instinct tell you?
translation.zh: ‎你的直觉认为会如何？

translation.en: That it's mighty strong medicine
translation.zh: ‎对于一生过分乐观的自我专注来说

translation.en: for a lifetime of starry-eyed self-absorption.
translation.zh: ‎对于一生过分乐观的自我专注来说 ‎这是一剂猛药

translation.en: It's one of those cures that could be worse than the disease.
translation.zh: ‎是那种比疾病本身还可怕的治疗方法

translation.en: But you, of all people, should know about that.
translation.zh: ‎但你应该比任何人都清楚

translation.en: He took the script?
translation.zh: ‎他带走了剧本？

translation.en: Will he show it to her?
translation.zh: ‎他会给她看吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: Do you want him to?
translation.zh: ‎你希望他给她看吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道

translation.en: Sinclair is yesterday's fish-wrap.
translation.zh: ‎辛克莱已经是昨日旧闻了

translation.en: Never stood a chance.
translation.zh: ‎根本不曾有过机会

translation.en: Make up your mind.
translation.zh: ‎想好了

translation.en: Are we home licking our wounds or here making the best of it?
translation.zh:
‎我们是要舔舐伤口
‎还是尽力发挥它的作用？

translation.en: We're making the best of it.
translation.zh: ‎我们要尽力发挥它的作用

translation.en: -Good evening. Name? -Mankiewicz.
translation.zh:
‎-晚上好 您贵姓？
‎-曼奇维兹

translation.en: Sorry, what was that?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 怎么写？

translation.en: M-A-N-K-I-E-W-I-C, and outta nowhere, a Z.
translation.zh: ‎曼-奇-维-兹

translation.en: -Table 14. -Ends of the earth. A clean exit.
translation.zh:
‎-14号桌
‎-远离人群 退场方便

translation.en: Mankiewicz, Herman.
translation.zh: ‎曼奇维兹 赫尔曼

translation.en: Terribly sorry. Table one. Right this way.
translation.zh: ‎非常抱歉 是一号桌 这边请

translation.en: If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all.
translation.zh: ‎如果说不出好话 你就什么也别说

translation.en: -Table one. -Sara!
translation.zh:
‎-一号桌
‎-莎拉！

translation.en: Good grief. Look who's here. How about that?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 看看谁来了 如何？

translation.en: -Sara. -What a loyal friend you are.
translation.zh:
‎-莎拉
‎-你真是个忠实的朋友

translation.en: -I never thought we'd see Mank. -I'm surprised.
translation.zh:
‎-我没想到我们能见到曼克
‎-我很意外

translation.en: I would've imagined you in pajamas by now.
translation.zh: ‎我以为这个时候你应该穿着睡衣才对

translation.en: Mank, turns out we have the same dentist on Camden.
translation.zh: ‎我们在卡姆登看的是同一个牙医

translation.en: Sara, we have to plan a day of shopping and catch up.
translation.zh:
‎莎拉 我们该计划一天
‎一起买东西 说说话

translation.en: Herman, I met your brother. He's a chip off the old block.
translation.zh:
‎我见过你弟弟了
‎他和你是一个模子里刻出来的

translation.en: Quite handsome.
translation.zh: ‎挺帅的

translation.en: Please, sit.
translation.zh: ‎请坐

translation.en: I can't tell you how much it means. I'm touched you'd come.
translation.zh:
‎我无法用言语表达这有多重要
‎你能来我很感动

translation.en: Thank you for this.
translation.zh: ‎非常感谢

translation.en: Why do I love you?
translation.zh: ‎我为什么会爱你？

translation.en: What's everyone else having?
translation.zh: ‎其他人喝什么？

translation.en: -What a great night. Great result. -I'll drink to that.
translation.zh:
‎（梅里亚姆-辛克莱） ‎-美好的夜晚 美好的结果
‎-我要为此干杯

translation.en: You see, if you just give people what they need to know
translation.zh:
‎你看 只要给人们
‎他们需要知道的信息

translation.en: in an emotional way, you can expect they'll do the right thing.
translation.zh:
‎辅以动情的方式
‎他们就会做出正确的选择

translation.en: I think what you mean,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你的意思是

translation.en: "If you keep telling people something untrue,
translation.zh: ‎“如果你持续告诉人们不实的信息

translation.en: loud and long enough, they're apt to believe it."
translation.zh:
‎足够大声 足够长久
‎他们就会相信”

translation.en: That's not what he was saying.
translation.zh: ‎他不是这个意思

translation.en: What's going on here? Are we quoting Goebbels?
translation.zh:
‎怎么回事？
‎我们在引用戈培尔的文章吗？

translation.en: -I'd like to debate that with L.B. -I'd like to see that.
translation.zh:
‎-这一点我愿意和梅耶辩论
‎-我想看

translation.en: Mank, have another.
translation.zh: ‎曼克 再来一杯

translation.en: It's early. Every vote counts.
translation.zh: ‎时间还早 每张选票都算数

translation.en: Maybe the informed of California are late leaving work.
translation.zh: ‎也许明智的加州人很晚才下班

translation.en: The last I heard, Irving, it's still a democracy.
translation.zh: ‎据我所知 欧文 现在还是民主政治

translation.en: -Of the people. -By the people.
translation.zh:
‎-民有
‎-民治

translation.en: What are you two talking about?
translation.zh: ‎你们在说什么？

translation.en: I tell you what, how about…
translation.zh: ‎我跟你说 不如…

translation.en: double or nothin'?
translation.zh:
‎-输了赔双倍？
‎-他在说什么？

translation.en: -What's he saying? -Herman.
translation.zh:
‎-输了赔双倍？
‎-他在说什么？ ‎赫尔曼

translation.en: You really will bet on anything.
translation.zh: ‎什么事情你都可以拿来赌

translation.en: Keep your money. I'm happy enough
translation.zh: ‎留着你的钱吧

translation.en: just to nail that utopian son of a bitch to the wall.
translation.zh:
‎把那个乌托邦混蛋钉在墙上
‎我就已经很开心了

translation.en: I told you, your obligation was canceled out of gratitude.
translation.zh: ‎出于感恩 你的赌债已经撤销了

translation.en: Wait a minute. What?
translation.zh: ‎等等 什么？

translation.en: He wants to wager double or nothin' on a debt he doesn't even owe us?
translation.zh:
‎他想对他并没有
‎欠我们的赌债赌输了赔双倍？

translation.en: -Mank. -It's a matter of principle, L.B.
translation.zh: ‎曼克 ‎这是原则问题 你不会明白的

translation.en: You wouldn't understand.
translation.zh: ‎这是原则问题 你不会明白的

translation.en: I understand plenty. I'll take that bet.
translation.zh: ‎我很明白 ‎我接受赌注

translation.en: Okay, Mank, you're on. Twenty-four grand or nothing.
translation.zh:
‎好 曼克 赌局开始
‎赌注两万四千美元

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: I'm going to throw up.
translation.zh: ‎我要去吐了

translation.en: I needed some air.
translation.zh: ‎我需要出去透透气

translation.en: Why do you love me?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么爱我？

translation.en: Excuse me, my friends.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我的朋友们

translation.en: The final, incomplete count for tonight is…
translation.zh: ‎今晚最终的不完全统计结果是…

translation.en: Upton Sinclair, the lousy Bolshevik…
translation.zh: ‎厄普顿辛克莱 讨厌的布尔什维克

translation.en: Frank Merriam…
translation.zh: ‎弗兰克梅里亚姆

translation.en: the good Republican,
translation.zh: ‎善良的共和党人

translation.en: My friends!
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友们！

translation.en: Everybody get up and sing with me!
translation.zh: ‎所有人起立和我一起唱！

translation.en: Sing with me! Everybody, up and sing!
translation.zh: ‎和我一起唱！各位 站起来唱！

translation.en: It was a team effort. Thanks.
translation.zh: ‎这是团队合作的成果 谢谢

translation.en: Mr. Mankiewicz, I'm so sorry to bother you,
translation.zh: ‎曼奇维兹先生 很抱歉打扰你

translation.en: but there's a telephone call for you. Right back this way.
translation.zh: ‎有你的电话 ‎这边请

translation.en: -Hello. -Mank, it's Shelly.
translation.zh:
‎-喂
‎-曼克 我是雪莱

translation.en: It's Shelly.
translation.zh: ‎是雪莱

translation.en: -He lost, Mank. -Yeah, it's been a bad night.
translation.zh:
‎-他输了 曼克
‎-是啊 真是个糟糕的夜晚

translation.en: It's my fault.
translation.zh: ‎是我的错

translation.en: -Easy, fella, you only voted once. -He was just on the radio.
translation.zh:
‎-放轻松 伙计 你只投了一票
‎-他刚刚在电台讲话了

translation.en: He said the phony newsreels cost him the election.
translation.zh: ‎他说是虚假的新闻影片让他输了选举

translation.en: That shows how naive he is.
translation.zh: ‎这可以看出他有多天真

translation.en: FDR cost him the election by staying on the sidelines.
translation.zh:
‎富兰克林罗斯福的观望态度
‎让他输了选举

translation.en: Sleep it off.
translation.zh: ‎睡一觉就过去了

translation.en: I'm not at home.
translation.zh: ‎我不在家

translation.en: Where are you? Let me call you a cab.
translation.zh: ‎你在哪？我帮你叫一辆出租车

translation.en: Never mind. I'll take the Pasadena Freeway.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我走帕萨迪纳高速

translation.en: Nobody'd be on it election night.
translation.zh: ‎选举夜那里不会有人

translation.en: Hello? Hello?
-How may I direct your call? -Normandie, 4761.
translation.zh:
‎-需要接哪里？
‎-诺曼底4761

translation.en: He's shit-faced.
translation.zh: ‎他喝大了

translation.en: Shell, is that you?
translation.zh: ‎雪莱 是你吗？

translation.en: It's Herman Mankiewicz.
translation.zh: ‎我是赫尔曼曼奇维兹 他在哪？

translation.en: -Where is he? -I don't know. I'm so worried.
translation.zh: ‎我是赫尔曼曼奇维兹 他在哪？ ‎我不知道 我很担心

translation.en: He left here very upset, and he's got a pistol with him.
translation.zh:
‎他非常难过地离开了这里
‎身上还带着枪

translation.en: Don't worry, Fay. I'll find him.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 菲 我会去找他

translation.en: -Eve. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-伊芙
‎-什么？

translation.en: -I'm Eve. Fay was his first. -I'll find him.
translation.zh:
‎-我是伊芙 菲是他第一任妻子
‎-我会去找他

translation.en: Is Houseman coming back? I never thought I'd miss him.
translation.zh:
‎豪斯曼会回来吗？
‎我从没想到我会思念他

translation.en: He and the wunderkind are cutting the first draft.
translation.zh: ‎他和神童在删减第一稿

translation.en: A form of creative vivisection.
translation.zh: ‎创造性的活体解剖

translation.en: Vital organs are exposed, nothing is learned,
translation.zh: ‎重要器官暴露在外 没有收获

translation.en: the patient dies on the table.
translation.zh: ‎病人死在了手术台上

translation.en: What have we here?
translation.zh: ‎我们看到了什么？

translation.en: Why, it's a puffed-up, sharp-tailed, red-ruffled magpie.
translation.zh:
‎怎么 是一只蓬松
‎尖尾巴、红竖羽的喜鹊

translation.en: A whatie?
translation.zh: ‎什么东西？

translation.en: -How do you like the Mojave? -God's answer for drunks and reprobates.
translation.zh:
‎-你对莫哈韦感觉如何？
‎-这里是上帝对酒鬼和堕落者的回应

translation.en: Perfect place to dry out.
translation.zh: ‎戒酒的完美地点

translation.en: -How's that working? -It didn't take. Cheers.
translation.zh:
‎-戒得怎么样？
‎-没成功 干杯

translation.en: L'chaim.
translation.zh: ‎敬生活

translation.en: Why are you doing this?
translation.zh: ‎为什么要这么做？

translation.en: -Posterity. -Posterity, my ass.
translation.zh:
‎-为了后人
‎-为了后人个鬼

translation.en: -From the original Latin. -Don't patronize me.
translation.zh:
‎-源自拉丁语
‎-别摆出一副高人一等的姿态

translation.en: -My Latin grades were better than yours. -Bibamus, moriendum est.
translation.zh: ‎我的拉丁语成绩比你好 ‎人总有一死 今朝有酒今朝醉

translation.en: I read your little script.
translation.zh: ‎我读了你的剧本

translation.en: News travels fast.
translation.zh: ‎消息可真快

translation.en: Even without the title page,
translation.zh: ‎哪怕没有标题页

translation.en: you don't need to be Philip Marlowe to know who wrote it.
translation.zh:
‎不用菲力普马罗侦探帮忙
‎你也能知道这是谁写的

translation.en: Have at it.
translation.zh: ‎说说你的想法吧

translation.en: It's very… complicated.
translation.zh: ‎非常…复杂

translation.en: Well, thanks for coming out.
translation.zh: ‎多谢你的建议

translation.en: Herman, this is me.
translation.zh: ‎赫尔曼 这是我的想法

translation.en: You pick a fight with Willie, you are finished.
translation.zh: ‎你选择和威利为敌 你就完了

translation.en: Mayer can't save you. Nobody can.
translation.zh: ‎梅耶救不了你 谁也救不了你

translation.en: Especially the boy genius from New York.
translation.zh: ‎特别是纽约的神童

translation.en: -You're far too political, Joe. -Self-preservation is not politics.
translation.zh:
‎-你太喜欢玩政治了 乔
‎-自我保护不是政治

translation.en: Him, I get.
translation.zh: ‎写他我能理解

translation.en: -But what did Marion do to deserve this? -It's not her!
translation.zh: ‎但玛丽恩做了什么 要被这样对待？ ‎不是她！

translation.en: You know better than anyone, not all characters are headliners.
translation.zh:
‎你比任何人都清楚
‎不是所有角色都是主角

translation.en: Some are secondary.
translation.zh: ‎有些是次要角色

translation.en: Well, that's why I'm here. On behalf of the secondary characters.
translation.zh: ‎所以我才会来 代表次要角色们

translation.en: I thought you'd wanna know there's a rumor
translation.zh: ‎我以为你会想知道一下这则传言

translation.en: you're out to get Hearst because they dropped you from L.B.'s payroll,
translation.zh:
‎有人说你针对赫斯特是因为
‎他们把你从梅耶的薪酬列表上剔除了

translation.en: that they didn't want you around.
translation.zh: ‎他们不想见到你

translation.en: Don't believe everything you hear at Schwab's.
translation.zh:
‎不要相信你在施瓦布药店
‎听到的所有传言

translation.en: Hey, you made yourself court jester.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 是你自取其辱

translation.en: Someone had to say it.
translation.zh: ‎总要有人说出来

translation.en: People are speculating Rosebud is W.R.'s pet name for Marion's genitalia.
translation.zh:
‎人们猜测玫瑰花蕾是
‎威廉对玛丽恩的生殖器的昵称

translation.en: -I know you'd never stoop to that. -Only because I hadn't heard.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你不会那么低俗 ‎那只是因为我没有听说过

translation.en: Charlie tells me you're up for Thalberg's old job.
translation.zh: ‎查理告诉我你要接受萨伯格的旧岗位

translation.en: -Not anymore. -Did I bollix that?
translation.zh:
‎-不会了
‎-是我搞砸了吗？

translation.en: Don't flatter yourself, Herman. I did it all alone.
translation.zh:
‎不要自己邀功了 赫尔曼
‎是我一个人的事

translation.en: Now, there's a first.
translation.zh: ‎总有先来后到

translation.en: I exposed myself, not entirely metaphorically, in court.
translation.zh:
‎并不是完全隐喻意义上的
‎我在法庭上暴露了自己

translation.en: Do tell.
translation.zh: ‎说说看

translation.en: Somebody was bitching about Mervyn LeRoy running over budget on Wizard of Oz.
translation.zh:
‎有人抱怨茂文李洛埃的《绿野仙踪》
‎超出预算

translation.en: -Goddamn movie again. -I said, "Le Roy s'amuse."
translation.zh:
‎-又是那部该死的电影
‎-我说：“李洛埃享受鱼水之欢”

translation.en: I was then forced to spend 20 minutes
translation.zh: ‎接下来我花了20分钟

translation.en: having to explain that "Le Roy" is "le roi" in French and means "the king."
translation.zh:
‎不得不解释“李洛埃”的发音
‎在法语里是国王的意思

translation.en: Or to be specific, François I
translation.zh: ‎具体一点 指的是弗朗索瓦一世

translation.en: and his royal habit of s'amus-ing himself by diddling all the ladies of his court.
translation.zh: ‎他有享受鱼水之欢的习惯 ‎和女士们在庭院里作乐

translation.en: You know, Pop was right. You should've been a professor.
translation.zh: ‎波普说得对 你应该当个教授的

translation.en: Nobody knew what the fuck I was talking about.
translation.zh: ‎没人知道我他妈在说什么

translation.en: They say I was passed over because I'm not a team player.
translation.zh:
‎他们说我得不到重用
‎是因为不擅长团队合作

translation.en: But I know better.
translation.zh: ‎但我很清楚

translation.en: It was the goddamn French pun that did me in.
translation.zh: ‎是法语双关语耽误了我

translation.en: I'm washed up, Joe.
translation.zh: ‎我已经江郎才尽了 乔

translation.en: Have been for years.
translation.zh: ‎已经好多年了

translation.en: It's the best thing you've ever written.
translation.zh: ‎这是你写过最棒的作品

translation.en: A rare bird, that.
translation.zh: ‎真是罕见的鸟儿

translation.en: A Mankiewicz.
translation.zh: ‎是曼奇维兹

translation.en: -You can't do it that way. -Do what?
translation.zh:
‎-你不能那样做
‎-做什么？

translation.en: Kill yourself. I've tried. It takes years.
translation.zh: ‎自杀 我试过 要花好多年

translation.en: I was tired of doing inserts and pick-up shots.
translation.zh: ‎我已经受够了拍插入和补拍镜头

translation.en: You're not the first person to trade integrity for a chance in the big chair.
translation.zh:
‎你不是第一个
‎出卖正直的灵魂换取高位的人

translation.en: Thalberg said this was your idea.
translation.zh: ‎萨伯格说这是你的主意

translation.en: Sometimes my asides are too clever by half.
translation.zh: ‎有时候我的喃喃自语过于机智了

translation.en: Go home to Fay.
translation.zh: ‎回到菲身边去吧

translation.en: -Eve. -Eve. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-是伊芙
‎-伊芙 对不起

translation.en: Look at what we did. We can't un-ring this bell.
translation.zh: ‎看看我们都做了什么 覆水难收

translation.en: We have to be vigilant. In regards to?
translation.zh:
‎-我们要警惕
‎-警惕什么？

translation.en: People sitting in the dark,
translation.zh: ‎黑暗中观看的观众

translation.en: willingly checking their disbelief at the door.
translation.zh: ‎欣然地把质疑之心抛诸脑后

translation.en: We have a huge responsibility.
translation.zh: ‎我们有很大的责任

translation.en: I got it.
translation.zh: ‎我得了

translation.en: Got what?
translation.zh: ‎得什么了？

translation.en: Parkinson's.
translation.zh: ‎帕金森

translation.en: No, Shelly.
translation.zh: ‎不 雪莱

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我很抱歉

translation.en: First, you get the tremors,
translation.zh: ‎一开始你会发抖

translation.en: and your muscles begin to fail.
translation.zh: ‎你的肌肉开始失去功能

translation.en: Pretty soon, you can't get out of a chair.
translation.zh: ‎很快 你就无法从椅子里起来

translation.en: Then smiling, speaking, everything goes.
translation.zh:
‎之后无法微笑
‎无法说话 什么都不能做

translation.en: And it keeps going till…
translation.zh: ‎一直持续到…

translation.en: You could always produce.
translation.zh: ‎你总能继续制片

translation.en: Give me the gun, Shelly.
translation.zh: ‎把枪给我 雪莱

translation.en: Take 'em, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎拿去吧 曼克

translation.en: Go on home. I'll be fine.
translation.zh: ‎回家吧 我没事的

translation.en: Is he with you?
translation.zh: ‎他和你一起的吗？

translation.en: He wouldn't come.
translation.zh: ‎他不愿意来

translation.en: Tell me you got the gun.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我你拿走了枪

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: ‎哦 我的天！

translation.en: -What? -He had a whole box.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？
‎-他拿走了一整盒

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: You have another visitor.
translation.zh: ‎你又有一位访客

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: ‎什么？

translation.en: Drink it fast.
translation.zh: ‎快点喝

translation.en: In this heat, it'll flash to sugar.
translation.zh: ‎这么热 都要蒸发成糖块了

translation.en: Why the wine and dine, Marion?
translation.zh: ‎为什么有美酒配佳肴 玛丽恩？

translation.en: Good cop, bad cop?
translation.zh: ‎唱白脸和唱红脸的策略？

translation.en: -How do you mean, Mank? -First Joe, now you.
translation.zh:
‎-什么意思 曼克？
‎-先是乔 然后是你

translation.en: Can't you just tell me what's on your mind?
translation.zh: ‎你就不能告诉我你的想法吗？

translation.en: Well, I read the script.
translation.zh: ‎我读过剧本了

translation.en: Who hasn't?
translation.zh: ‎谁还没读过？

translation.en: It's very grand, Mank, in its own way, and very much you.
translation.zh:
‎它非常宏大 曼克
‎以它独有的方式 也很有你的风格

translation.en: I would've loved to play me ten years ago.
translation.zh: ‎十年前的话 我很愿意出演我自己

translation.en: It was never meant to be you.
translation.zh: ‎那写的并不是你

translation.en: For myself, I don't care, Mank. Really, I don't.
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 我不在乎 真的 不在乎

translation.en: But I beg you, don't kick Pops when he's down.
translation.zh: ‎但我求你 不要对波普斯落井下石

translation.en: Willie, down?
translation.zh: ‎威利 落井？

translation.en: I haven't told a soul this,
translation.zh: ‎我没有跟任何人说过

translation.en: but I had to loan him a million dollars just to save San Simeon.
translation.zh:
‎但我不得不借了他
‎一百万美元挽救圣西米恩

translation.en: You hocked your jewels?
translation.zh: ‎你变卖了自己的珠宝？

translation.en: Of course not, just some real estate. He bought me most of it anyway.
translation.zh:
‎当然没有 只是卖了些房地产
‎大部分是他买给我的

translation.en: Willie sent you.
translation.zh: ‎是威利让你来的

translation.en: Didn't have to.
translation.zh: ‎没有这个必要

translation.en: That surprises you?
translation.zh: ‎你很惊讶吗？

translation.en: You're the most observant man I know.
translation.zh: ‎你是我认识的最善于观察的人

translation.en: -Then you deserve better. -That's very sweet.
translation.zh:
‎-那你值得认识更好的人
‎-你真会说

translation.en: I always wanted better.
translation.zh: ‎我总想要更好的

translation.en: Mama Rose, too.
translation.zh: ‎露丝妈妈也是

translation.en: She made sure her daughters learned to sing and dance.
translation.zh: ‎她确保女儿们都学会唱歌跳舞

translation.en: We were never gonna end up in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: ‎但我们永远不可能去布鲁克林

translation.en: I was only 16 when I was cast in Stop! Look! Listen!
translation.zh:
‎我被选上参演
‎《停！看！听！》时只有16岁

translation.en: That's some title.
translation.zh: ‎这很值得骄傲

translation.en: Willie came to the show. Same seat, every night.
translation.zh:
‎威利来看了表演
‎每晚都坐在相同的位置

translation.en: And all the other girls said to watch out. He was too old for me and too interested.
translation.zh:
‎其他女孩都叫我小心
‎他年纪比我大太多 对我过于有兴趣

translation.en: Come now, he wasn't your only admirer.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 他不是你唯一的追求者

translation.en: The thing you got so right in your script…
translation.zh: ‎你剧本里写得非常对的一点…

translation.en: was how lonely he'd been as a boy.
translation.zh: ‎就是他小时候非常孤独

translation.en: When my own mother heard he was one of the richest men in America,
translation.zh:
‎当我母亲听说
‎他是全美最富有的人之一时

translation.en: she said, "Kick a little higher."
translation.zh: ‎她说：“眼光高一点”

translation.en: He has always been so kind to me.
translation.zh: ‎他一直对我很好

translation.en: I love the old guy, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢这个老家伙 曼克

translation.en: Maybe I didn't always, back when he was my social security.
translation.zh:
‎也许不是一直喜欢他
‎比如在我还把他当作社保的时候

translation.en: But now, there are things about us together…
translation.zh: ‎但现在 我们彼此之间有些东西…

translation.en: that no one could possibly…
translation.zh: ‎没有人可能…

translation.en: Am I persuading you at all?
translation.zh: ‎我说服你了吗？

translation.en: I hope, if this gets made,
translation.zh: ‎我希望如果这部电影拍出来

translation.en: you'll forgive me.
translation.zh: ‎你能原谅我

translation.en: And I hope, if it doesn't,
translation.zh: ‎这是我的希望 如果没有拍成

translation.en: you'll forgive me.
translation.zh: ‎你会原谅我

translation.en: He was a modest man.
translation.zh: ‎他是个谦逊的人

translation.en: His name never appeared on the marquee
translation.zh: ‎他的名字从未出现在户外帐篷上

translation.en: with the great stars, great producers, great directors who worked alongside him.
translation.zh:
‎与曾和他合作过的伟大的明星
‎制片人及导演排列在一起

translation.en: But he loved moving pictures more than he loved anything.
translation.zh: ‎但他热爱电影 胜过一切

translation.en: And he left his impeccable taste, his incredible attention to detail
translation.zh:
‎他无可挑剔的品味
‎和对细节的极致关注

translation.en: on every frame he touched.
translation.zh: ‎留存在他处理过的每一帧画面里

translation.en: It is not for us to say why he was taken from us so unexpectedly.
translation.zh:
‎我们无法说清
‎他为何如此突然地离开我们

translation.en: Behind, he leaves his memory.
translation.zh: ‎他于身后留下了回忆

translation.en: The memory of a great man, a talented man, a man of unblemished integrity.
translation.zh: ‎一个伟大、有才华、正直的人的回忆

translation.en: Irving G. Thalberg.
translation.zh: ‎欧文G萨伯格

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: I haven't seen you since, what was it, Jack Gilbert's funeral?
translation.zh:
‎好久不见
‎上次还是在杰克吉尔伯特的葬礼上

translation.en: Well, I haven't seen you since Shelly Metcalf's.
translation.zh:
‎雪莱麦特卡夫的葬礼之后
‎我还是第一次见你

translation.en: Has it been that long?
translation.zh: ‎都这么久了吗？

translation.en: -How you been, Mank? -Between pictures.
translation.zh: ‎你好吗 曼克？ ‎忙着拍电影

translation.en: -I thought you were still at MGM. -I am.
translation.zh: ‎我以为你还在米高梅 ‎我在

translation.en: Well, look. Come see me at International. Let's work something out.
translation.zh:
‎来塞尔兹尼克国际影业找我
‎我们一起做点什么

translation.en: I did come to see you.
translation.zh: ‎我去找过你

translation.en: You gave me the same invitation after Shelly's funeral.
translation.zh:
‎你向我发出了
‎和在雪莱葬礼后一样的邀请

translation.en: I couldn't get past your secretary's secretary.
translation.zh: ‎我无法越过你秘书的秘书

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.zh: ‎对吗？

translation.en: Good to see you, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到你 曼克

translation.en: -Hello. -Mank?
One moment, please.
translation.zh: ‎请稍等

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: Mank!
translation.zh: ‎曼克！

translation.en: It's Orson.
translation.zh: ‎是奥森

translation.en: It's Orson.
translation.zh: ‎是奥森

translation.en: -Hello. -Mank.
translation.zh: ‎喂

translation.en: I've just finished your first draft, and I must say,
translation.zh: ‎我刚读完你的第一稿 不得不说

translation.en: I'm pleased and impressed.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴 很满意

translation.en: -Are you? Good news. -It'll need work, of course.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？真是好消息
‎-当然 我还需要修改

translation.en: But there are no problems that can't be solved together.
translation.zh: ‎但我们合作就没有解决不了的问题

translation.en: Well, I'm delighted to hear it.
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴听到你这么说

translation.en: Houseman's bringing my notes. Think about 'em.
translation.zh: ‎我把我的笔记发给你

translation.en: Meantime, I'll run everything through my typewriter.
translation.zh:
‎同时我会用我的打字机
‎把全文再打一遍

translation.en: Everything will thank you.
translation.zh: ‎向你送上所有感谢

translation.en: You're in touch with your Hollywood crowd?
translation.zh: ‎你在接触好莱坞的朋友们？

translation.en: Good old Houseman.
translation.zh: ‎豪斯曼又多嘴了

translation.en: Perhaps you've heard. None of the theater chains will touch us.
translation.zh: ‎没有连锁影院会与我们合作

translation.en: It looks like RKO will have to sue for restraint of trade.
translation.zh: ‎雷电华会控诉贸易管制

translation.en: They'll countersue, of course.
translation.zh: ‎他们当然会反诉

translation.en: If you own any part of that lovely home of yours,
translation.zh: ‎如果你们温暖的小屋归属于你名下

translation.en: it might be a good idea to put it in Poor Sara's name.
translation.zh: ‎可能最好转到可怜的莎拉名下

translation.en: -You still there, Mank? -Yes. Where else would I be?
translation.zh:
‎-你还在听吗 曼克？
‎-在听 我还能去哪？

translation.en: I've saved the best for last.
translation.zh: ‎我把最好的留在最后

translation.en: Guess who phoned with an offer to buy out RKO's investment
translation.zh: ‎猜猜谁提出买下雷电华的投资权

translation.en: and shelve the picture permanently.
translation.zh: ‎并上架电影

translation.en: -Not Hearst? -Mank, I'm surprised.
translation.zh:
‎-不是赫斯特吧？
‎-曼克 我很惊讶

translation.en: Would Othello snoop on Desdemona when he has Iago?
translation.zh:
‎奥赛罗身边有伊阿古
‎他还会监视苔丝狄蒙娜吗？

translation.en: Mayer. What did RKO say?
translation.zh: ‎梅耶 雷电华怎么说？

translation.en: No dice, but they're on their uppers. Whether they--
translation.zh: ‎拒绝了 他们没多少钱 无论他们…

translation.en: -You'd better drive up. -I plan to, as soon as I'm done--
translation.zh:
‎-你最好追上去
‎-我是这么打算的 等完成之后…

translation.en: Today, if possible.
translation.zh: ‎如果可能的话 今天就去

translation.en: Dear Jove, did I say something I shouldn't have?
translation.zh: ‎老天啊 我说了什么不该说的吗？

translation.en: I hope you haven't lost your nerve.
translation.zh: ‎我希望没有把你吓到丢了魂

translation.en: Nerve's about all I've got left.
translation.zh: ‎我也只剩下魂魄了

translation.en: What a year you've had, Louis. How have you weathered it?
translation.zh:
‎多么波折的一年啊 路易斯
‎你是如何承受住的？

translation.en: Despite everything, the MGM ship, I'm happy to say, is full steam ahead.
translation.zh:
‎别的不说
‎我很高兴米高梅这艘大船在全速前进

translation.en: We're on track with this recent slate for our most successful year ever.
translation.zh:
‎我们今年最新的排片表
‎是历年来最成功的 目前进展顺利

translation.en: Well, that's great news.
translation.zh: ‎真是好消息

translation.en: Would you like to go and lay down?
translation.zh: ‎你想去躺一躺吗？

translation.en: I think I'd rather stay upright.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我还是坐着吧

translation.en: -Perhaps we can find you a costume. -Well, why would I need a cost--
translation.zh:
‎-也许我们可以给你找一身戏服
‎-我为什么需要一身…

translation.en: Hello, everyone. Better late than never.
translation.zh: ‎大家好 果然迟一点比较好啊

translation.en: Mank! Where's Sara?
translation.zh: ‎曼克！莎拉呢？

translation.en: Caring for clan Mankiewicz.
translation.zh: ‎在照顾曼奇维兹家族

translation.en: -And what train did you take? -Glendale. I missed my stop.
translation.zh:
‎-你搭的哪一班火车？
‎-格兰代尔 我错过了我的车站

translation.en: Got a taxi from Morro Bay.
translation.zh: ‎从莫罗湾打车来的

translation.en: I'm confused. I thought the invitation called for circus attire, not flea circus.
translation.zh:
‎我糊涂了 我以为请柬要求的是
‎马戏团服装 不是跳蚤马戏

translation.en: I was cornered by a man who sold vacuum cleaners.
translation.zh:
‎我被一个卖吸尘器的家伙
‎逼得走投无路

translation.en: A show of hands, who knows what a vacuum cleaner is?
translation.zh: ‎谁知道吸尘器是什么 请举手？

translation.en: Martin, would you set a place for Mr. Mankiewicz,
translation.zh: ‎马丁 帮曼奇维兹先生安排一个位置

translation.en: somewhere where he might get some air?
translation.zh: ‎就选方便他呼吸新鲜空气的位置吧？

translation.en: Would you follow me this way, sir?
translation.zh: ‎请跟我来 先生

translation.en: And offer him some coffee.
translation.zh: ‎给他一点咖啡

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Monkeywitz could use some coffee.
translation.zh: ‎对 盲奇维兹先生需要喝点咖啡

translation.en: And how's Marie Antoinette coming together?
translation.zh: ‎《玛丽安托瓦内特》如何？

translation.en: Previews have been a struggle for general audiences.
translation.zh: ‎试映会对大众观众来说很艰难

translation.en: We made some trims, but I should've known.
translation.zh: ‎我们做了些修剪 但我该提前想到的

translation.en: Versailles, all those costumes and wigs.
translation.zh: ‎凡尔赛 服装和假发

translation.en: You can't tell those stories without overhauling them for a modern audience.
translation.zh:
‎要把那些故事讲给现代观众听
‎就必须全面大改

translation.en: How's the performance of your leading lady?
translation.zh: ‎你的女主演表现如何？

translation.en: The picture depends upon her.
translation.zh: ‎电影都靠她了

translation.en: Norma put her heart and soul into it.
translation.zh: ‎诺玛全身心投入

translation.en: I should've insisted she take some time.
translation.zh: ‎我应该坚持让她多花些时间的

translation.en: -It's a lot to deal with a loss like that. -Marion would've made it her own.
translation.zh: ‎这种损失是很难弥补的 ‎如果是玛丽恩 就能演出自己的特色

translation.en: Marion would have been perfection.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽恩会很完美

translation.en: -Marion Antoinette. -But it was Irving's picture.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽恩安托瓦内特 ‎-但那是欧文的电影
‎-木偶玛丽恩内特

translation.en: Marionette.
translation.zh:
‎-但那是欧文的电影
‎-木偶玛丽恩内特

translation.en: I'm not interested in educating our customers.
translation.zh: ‎我没有兴趣教育我们的顾客

translation.en: You want to send a message? Call Western Union.
translation.zh: ‎你想传递信息？找西联发电报吧

translation.en: Literary pictures.
translation.zh: ‎文学电影

translation.en: "Let them get cake."
translation.zh: ‎“让他们吃蛋糕吧”

translation.en: Who needs to see that?
translation.zh: ‎谁需要看这个？

translation.en: Joanna, come along now. I'll show you those horses we talked about.
translation.zh:
‎乔安娜 过来
‎我带你去看之前说的那些马

translation.en: She's very pretty.
translation.zh: ‎她真漂亮

translation.en: Also, very bright, bullheaded, and British.
translation.zh:
‎而且很聪明 也很顽固
‎很有英国人风格

translation.en: Are you here to try your luck, too, Schnutz?
translation.zh: ‎你也是来碰运气的吗？

translation.en: -At what? -Changing my mind.
translation.zh:
‎-碰什么运气？
‎-改变我的主意

translation.en: I never had much success with that, Herman.
translation.zh: ‎这方面我从来都没什么把握 赫尔曼

translation.en: You'll do what you need to.
translation.zh: ‎你要做什么就做什么

translation.en: Charlie's been here, Joe's been, Marion's been.
translation.zh: ‎查理来过了 乔来过 玛丽恩也来过

translation.en: For one reason or another, all of them want me to walk away.
translation.zh:
‎为了这样或那样的理由
‎他们想让我避开烦恼

translation.en: You care to hear what I've decided?
translation.zh: ‎你关心我的决定吗？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: ‎不关心

translation.en: After 20 years of connubial bliss,
translation.zh: ‎经历了20年的美满婚姻之后

translation.en: blind loyalty can get a little suffocating.
translation.zh: ‎盲目的忠诚让人有点窒息

translation.en: Okay. Here goes.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 来了

translation.en: God knows I've rehearsed it enough.
translation.zh: ‎天知道我排练了多久

translation.en: I've raised your kids kosher and all but by myself.
translation.zh:
‎我按犹太习俗
‎养育了你的孩子们 全靠我自己

translation.en: I've put up with your suicidal drinking,
translation.zh: ‎我忍受了你自杀式的酗酒

translation.en: your compulsive gambling, your silly platonic affairs.
translation.zh:
‎强迫症般的赌博
‎愚蠢的柏拉图式外遇

translation.en: You owe me, Herman.
translation.zh: ‎你欠我的 赫尔曼

translation.en: Joe says he can't promise,
translation.zh: ‎乔说他不敢保证

translation.en: but he thinks if you make nice with Mayer, you can have your old job back.
translation.zh:
‎但他觉得如果你缓和与梅耶的关系
‎有可能找回旧工作

translation.en: Is that what you want me to say? I know what your answer'll be,
translation.zh: ‎这就是你想让我说的？ ‎我知道你会如何回答

translation.en: so don't ask me to give you Poor Sara's seal of approval.
translation.zh: ‎所以不要指望得到可怜的莎拉的批准

translation.en: Why do you put up with me, Schnutz?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么能忍受我 史努兹？

translation.en: My movie-star looks or my diplomat's charm?
translation.zh:
‎因为我电影明星般的长相
‎还是我外交官似的魅力？

translation.en: I suppose because being married to you, Herman,
translation.zh: ‎我想是因为 嫁给你 赫尔曼

translation.en: I'm never bored.
translation.zh: ‎我不会感到无聊

translation.en: Exhausted, yes. Exasperated, usually.
translation.zh: ‎确实很累 经常愤怒

translation.en: But having devoted so much,
translation.zh: ‎但投入了这么多

translation.en: I have to stick around to see how it turns out.
translation.zh:
‎我必须留在你身边
‎看看事情会如何发展

translation.en: And whatever you decide…
translation.zh: ‎无论你做何决定

translation.en: please be mindful of those who care about you most.
translation.zh: ‎请考虑那些最在乎你的人

translation.en: I'm going riding.
translation.zh: ‎我要去骑马了

translation.en: Haven't seen a horse's face in years.
translation.zh: ‎好多年没见过马了

translation.en: And one last thing, Herman.
translation.zh: ‎最后一件事 赫尔曼

translation.en: I don't want nobody calling me Poor Sara no more.
translation.zh:
‎我不希望任何人
‎再叫我“可怜的莎拉”了

translation.en: I've got a great idea for a picture, Louis.
translation.zh: ‎我有一个很棒的电影创意 路易斯

translation.en: A picture I just know you're gonna love.
translation.zh: ‎是一部我知道你会喜欢的电影

translation.en: It's a modern-day version of Quixote.
translation.zh: ‎是现代版的堂吉诃德

translation.en: Now, I know none of you read, but you know what it's about.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你们都不读书
‎但你们知道这是什么故事

translation.en: A deluded old nobleman who tilts at windmills.
translation.zh: ‎一个被骗的老贵族和风车对战

translation.en: So how might we update this story?
translation.zh: ‎我们要如何更新这个故事？

translation.en: -Do you want me to get someone? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-要不要我叫…
‎-不用

translation.en: How about we make our Quixote… a newspaperman?
translation.zh:
‎我们创造出自己的堂吉诃德如何…
‎一个报业人士？

translation.en: Who else could make a living tilting at windmills?
translation.zh: ‎还有谁能靠与风车战斗为生？

translation.en: But that's not enough.
translation.zh: ‎但这还不够

translation.en: No, he wants more than readership.
translation.zh: ‎不 他想要的不只是读者

translation.en: He wants more than adulation. He wants love.
translation.zh: ‎不只是奉承 他想要爱

translation.en: So, he runs for public office, and because he's notably rich, he wins.
translation.zh:
‎于是他竞选公职
‎因为非常富有 他胜选了

translation.en: No, wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎不 稍等

translation.en: Notably rich and powerful can't win over an audience
translation.zh:
‎非常富有且极具权势的他
‎要想赢得观众的心

translation.en: unless notably rich and powerful sees the error of his ways in the final reel.
translation.zh: ‎必须在电影最后看到自己做错在哪

translation.en: Notably rich and powerful
translation.zh: ‎非常富有且极具权势的他

translation.en: and making no goddamn excuses for it is only admirable in real life.
translation.zh:
‎不为此找任何借口
‎只为能在现实中受人尊敬

translation.en: Isn't that right, Louis?
translation.zh: ‎对吗 路易斯？

translation.en: So what do we do?
translation.zh: ‎我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Anybody?
translation.zh: ‎有人回答吗？

translation.en: We give him ideals.
translation.zh: ‎我们赋予他理想

translation.en: Ideals that any dirt-poor,
translation.zh: ‎是那种穷困、忧郁的观众

translation.en: depression-weary audience can identify with.
translation.zh: ‎都能认同的理想

translation.en: Our Quixote is against crooked trusts.
translation.zh:
‎我们的堂吉诃德要对抗的是
‎邪恶的商业信托

translation.en: He's for the eight-hour workday, fair income tax, better schools.
translation.zh:
‎他支持八小时工作制
‎公平的收入税 更好的学校教育

translation.en: Why, he's even for government ownership of railroads.
translation.zh: ‎为什么 他甚至支持政府拥有铁路

translation.en: You know what we call those people?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我们管这种人叫什么吗？

translation.en: -Communists? -Anarchists?
translation.zh:
‎-共产主义？
‎-无政府主义？

translation.en: No, our Quixote, he's a two-fisted muckraker.
translation.zh:
‎不 我们的堂吉诃德
‎是个强大的探听丑闻的人

translation.en: In fact, someone predicts that he will one day
translation.zh: ‎其实有人预测说 有一天他会

translation.en: win the presidency and bring about, get this…
translation.zh: ‎当选总统 带来所谓…

translation.en: a socialist revolution.
translation.zh: ‎社会主义革命

translation.en: -What a bunch of bullshit! -Is it?
translation.zh:
‎-都是什么狗屁！
‎-是吗？

translation.en: Tell him, Willie.
translation.zh: ‎跟他说说 威利

translation.en: Tell him.
translation.zh: ‎告诉他

translation.en: Upton Sinclair used exactly those words
translation.zh: ‎厄普顿辛克莱曾用这些话

translation.en: to describe a young William Randolph Hearst.
translation.zh: ‎描述年轻的威廉兰道夫赫斯特

translation.en: -You miserable bastard! -How do you do?
translation.zh:
‎-你这个可悲的混蛋！
‎-幸会

translation.en: Our Quixote, he hungers, he thirsts,
translation.zh: ‎我们的堂吉诃德十分饥渴

translation.en: he lusts for the voters to love him.
translation.zh: ‎他渴望选民们喜欢他

translation.en: Love him enough to make him president. But they won't, and they don't.
translation.zh:
‎喜欢到愿意选他为总统
‎但他们不会的 最终也没有这么做

translation.en: How do you suppose that could happen?
translation.zh: ‎这种事怎么会发生？

translation.en: Could it be because, in their hearts,
translation.zh: ‎可能是因为 在他们心中

translation.en: they know that he values power over people?
translation.zh: ‎他们知道比起人民 他更珍视权力？

translation.en: Disillusioned in Congress,
translation.zh: ‎幻想破灭进入国会后

translation.en: he authors not one single piece of legislation in two terms.
translation.zh:
‎他在两届任期内
‎没有签发任何一条法规

translation.en: Can you believe that? That'll take some writing.
translation.zh: ‎你敢相信吗？这要好好写一写

translation.en: Placed in nomination for president,
translation.zh: ‎被提名参选总统

translation.en: but it's too radical for the boys in the back.
translation.zh: ‎但这对背后的智囊团来说过于激进

translation.en: His bid goes nowhere, but we're doing something.
translation.zh:
‎他的努力未能有结果
‎但我们在做一件事

translation.en: We're building sympathy.
translation.zh: ‎我们在树立同情

translation.en: Rejected, he flees to lotus land,
translation.zh: ‎被拒后 他逃往安逸之地

translation.en: where his faithful troll, Sancho, has prepared a mythical kingdom.
translation.zh:
‎在那里 他忠诚的随从桑丘
‎准备了一座奇幻王国

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎等一下

translation.en: I forgot the love interest.
translation.zh: ‎我忘了说爱情故事

translation.en: Her name… Dulcinea.
translation.zh: ‎她名叫…达辛妮亚

translation.en: Funny, adventurous, smarter than she acts.
translation.zh: ‎有趣且爱冒险 比看起来要聪明

translation.en: She's a showgirl, beneath his social stratum,
translation.zh:
‎她是个…她是个歌舞女郎
‎社会地位比他低

translation.en: but that's okay, because true love on the big screens,
translation.zh: ‎但没关系 因为大银幕上的真爱

translation.en: we all know, is blind.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道是盲目的

translation.en: And she…
translation.zh: ‎而她…

translation.en: Yeah, she loves him, too.
translation.zh: ‎对 她也爱他

translation.en: So he takes her away to his mythical kingdom.
translation.zh: ‎所以他把她带到了他的奇幻王国

translation.en: Can I get a bicarb?
translation.zh: ‎能给我一份小苏打吗？

translation.en: Now, along comes nemesis.
translation.zh: ‎然后反派来了

translation.en: That's Greek for any guy in a black hat.
translation.zh: ‎这是黑帽反派的希腊名字

translation.en: Nemesis runs for governor, and he's a shoo-in to win.
translation.zh: ‎反派参选州长 胜局已定

translation.en: Why? Because he's exactly what our Don used to be.
translation.zh:
‎为什么？因为他就是
‎我们的堂吉诃德曾经的模样

translation.en: An idealist, you get it?
translation.zh: ‎理想主义者 明白吗？

translation.en: And not only that,
translation.zh: ‎不仅如此

translation.en: nemesis is the same guy who once predicted
translation.zh: ‎反派正是曾经预言我们的堂吉诃德

translation.en: our Quixote would one day preside over a socialist revolution.
translation.zh: ‎反派正是曾经预言我们的堂吉诃德 ‎有一天会发起社会主义革命的那个人

translation.en: Our Quixote looks into the mirror of his youth
translation.zh:
‎我们的堂吉诃德
‎看着自己年轻时的翻版

translation.en: and decides to break this glass,
translation.zh: ‎决定摧毁自己的翻版

translation.en: a maddening reminder of who he once was.
translation.zh:
‎因为这个让他想起
‎自己曾经模样的复刻品令人抓狂

translation.en: Assisted by his faithful Sancho
translation.zh: ‎在忠实的桑丘的帮助下

translation.en: and armed with all the black magic at his command,
translation.zh: ‎运用他掌握的各种黑魔法

translation.en: he does just this.
translation.zh: ‎他这样做了

translation.en: Destroying, in the process, not one man… but two.
translation.zh: ‎摧毁的不是一个人…而是两个

translation.en: Well, what do you think, Louis?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得如何 路易斯？

translation.en: You think it'll play?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得能上映吗？

translation.en: Don't worry, folks.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 各位

translation.en: The white wine came up with the fish.
translation.zh: ‎白葡萄酒和鱼肉一起出来了

translation.en: Who the fuck do you think you are, Mankiewicz?
translation.zh: ‎你以为你是谁 曼奇维兹？

translation.en: You're nothin' but a court jester.
translation.zh: ‎你就是个小丑

translation.en: And let me let you in on a little secret.
translation.zh: ‎让我来告诉你一个秘密

translation.en: Do you have any idea who pays half your salary?
translation.zh: ‎你知道是谁支付了你一半工资吗？

translation.en: He pays half your fucking salary.
translation.zh: ‎他付了你一半工资

translation.en: Him, you fucking ingrate.
translation.zh: ‎是他 你这个忘恩负义的东西

translation.en: You didn't know that, did ya? You wanna know why?
translation.zh: ‎你不知道吧？想知道为什么吗？

translation.en: Because he likes the way you talk.
translation.zh: ‎因为他喜欢你说话的方式

translation.en: Not the way you write, the way you talk.
translation.zh:
‎不是你写作的方式
‎而是你说话的方式

translation.en: Don't that chap your ass?
translation.zh: ‎是不是很难堪？

translation.en: -Please, follow me. -It's very quaint.
translation.zh:
‎-请跟我来
‎-这很古怪

translation.en: Rise and shine, hombre.
translation.zh: ‎起床了 伙计

translation.en: Shoot-out at the O.K. Corral.
translation.zh: ‎在OK牧场枪战

translation.en: Before we buckle down, you have something to get off your chest?
translation.zh:
‎在开始工作之前
‎你有什么想倾诉的吗？

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I do.
translation.zh: ‎其实还真有

translation.en: Frankly, I think what I said upset you.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我说的话让你不高兴了

translation.en: I know your health's not what it might be, and that comes first.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你的健康状况不是看起来那样
‎这最重要

translation.en: -Really? -This studio fuss, this lawsuit.
translation.zh:
‎-是吗？
‎-电影公司的抗议 诉讼

translation.en: God knows what pressure's yet to come.
translation.zh: ‎天知道还会有什么压力

translation.en: At your age, you'd be justified in wanting out.
translation.zh: ‎在你这个年纪 想要逃离是很正常的

translation.en: I'm 43, but that's very understanding.
translation.zh: ‎我43岁 但你这样想很体谅人

translation.en: Mayer's buyout was rejected,
translation.zh: ‎梅耶的收购被拒绝了

translation.en: so the fat's only starting to hit the fire.
translation.zh: ‎糟糕的事情刚刚开始

translation.en: Now, I talked to RKO, and I'll tell you what they're ready to do.
translation.zh:
‎我和雷电华聊过了
‎我会告诉你他们的打算

translation.en: In recognition of the outstanding work you've done so far,
translation.zh: ‎为了酬谢你的杰出创作

translation.en: they're prepared to relieve you of the rewrite and still honor your full pay…
translation.zh:
‎他们不会要求你重写
‎还会给你全额稿费
‎外加一万美金

translation.en: How's that?
translation.zh: ‎如何？

translation.en: That's more than generous.
translation.zh: ‎这太慷慨了

translation.en: But I don't intend to walk.
translation.zh: ‎但我不打算退出

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: ‎好吧

translation.en: What's bothering you, then?
translation.zh: ‎那你在担心什么？

translation.en: You're not going to like this, Orson.
translation.zh: ‎你会不高兴的 奥森

translation.en: I want credit.
translation.zh: ‎我想署名

translation.en: Come again?
translation.zh: ‎再说一次？

translation.en: It's the best thing I've ever written.
translation.zh: ‎这是我写过最好的作品

translation.en: Jack, get me some Cuban cigars.
translation.zh: ‎杰克 给我弄点古巴雪茄

translation.en: -In Victorville? -Do what you can, Jack.
translation.zh:
‎-在维克多维尔？
‎-你自己想办法

translation.en: Stay, Houseman. You'll miss the third act complicator.
translation.zh:
‎别走 豪斯曼
‎你会错过第三幕的复杂点

translation.en: Get going, Jack. Muy pronto.
translation.zh: ‎去吧 杰克 “木易普朗托”

translation.en: I believe that means right away.
translation.zh: ‎我相信这是快点的意思

translation.en: Mank.
translation.zh: ‎曼克

translation.en: What I said was more in sorrow than in anger, Willie.
translation.zh:
‎我说的话更多的是出于伤感
‎而非愤怒 威利

translation.en: Are you familiar with the parable of the organ grinder's monkey?
translation.zh:
‎你熟悉“街头艺人的猴子”
‎这个寓言吗？

translation.en: Now, the organ grinder's monkey is tiny in stature,
translation.zh: ‎街头艺人的猴子身材矮小

translation.en: and having been taken from the wild,
translation.zh: ‎来自野外

translation.en: he's naturally overwhelmed by the enormous world around him.
translation.zh: ‎它自然对周遭庞大的世界应接不暇

translation.en: But every morning, a sweet elderly woman dresses him in a fine suit of clothes.
translation.zh:
‎但每天早晨 一个和蔼的老妇人
‎都给它穿上一身好看的衣服

translation.en: She fits him with a red velvet vest adorned with pearl buttons
translation.zh:
‎她给它穿了一件
‎装饰着珍珠钮扣的红丝绒背心

translation.en: and a handsome red fez with a silk tassel.
translation.zh: ‎和一顶带有丝质流苏的帅气的红毡帽

translation.en: She slips on brocade shoes that curl at the toe.
translation.zh: ‎她穿上脚尖上翘的织锦鞋

translation.en: And he's paired with a fine gilt music box on an exquisite gold chain
translation.zh:
‎而它则被一个
‎漂亮的镀金音乐盒上的金链子

translation.en: fastened to his neck and his neck alone.
translation.zh: ‎锁住了脖子

translation.en: Whenever he ventures into the city to perform, he thinks,
translation.zh: ‎每次到城市里表演 ‎它心想：“我一定是个强大的家伙”

translation.en: "What a powerful fellow I must be."
translation.zh: ‎它心想：“我一定是个强大的家伙”

translation.en: "Look how patiently everyone waits just to watch me dance."
translation.zh:
‎“看看大家
‎等着看我跳舞的样子多耐心啊”

translation.en: Willie--
translation.zh: ‎嘿 威利…

translation.en: "And wherever I go," he thinks,
translation.zh: ‎“无论我去哪里” 它心想

translation.en: "this music box must follow, and with it, this poor downtrodden man."
translation.zh:
‎“这个音乐盒都要跟着我
‎还有这个惨遭蹂躏的可怜人”

translation.en: "And if I chose not to dance, this sorry street peddler would starve,
translation.zh:
‎“如果我选择不跳舞
‎这个可怜的街头小贩就会挨饿

translation.en: and every time I do decide to dance, every time…
translation.zh: ‎而每次我选择跳舞时 每一次…

translation.en: he must play."
translation.zh: ‎他一定要表演”

translation.en: "Whether he wishes to or not."
translation.zh: ‎“无论他是否愿意”

translation.en: You've had a bit too much to drink, Herman.
translation.zh: ‎你喝太多了 赫尔曼

translation.en: I'll get Raymond to drive you to the station.
translation.zh: ‎我会让雷蒙德开车送你去车站

translation.en: Goodbye.
translation.zh: ‎再见

translation.en: Put aside gratitude, Mank.
translation.zh: ‎不用谢 曼克

translation.en: That you've done your best work was no accident.
translation.zh: ‎你写出最棒的作品并非意外

translation.en: I removed any distraction, eliminated every excuse,
translation.zh: ‎我移开了所有干扰 消除了每个借口

translation.en: your family, your cronies, liquor.
translation.zh: ‎你的家人、亲友、酒精

translation.en: I gave you a second chance.
translation.zh: ‎我给了你第二次机会

translation.en: And for that, I cannot thank you enough.
translation.zh: ‎对此我感激不尽

translation.en: But with credit for a risky undertaking must go the weight of real responsibility.
translation.zh:
‎但对风险承担的认可
‎一定要配得上相应的真正的责任

translation.en: Given your health, I wonder if you're up to it.
translation.zh:
‎考虑到你的健康状况
‎我担心你是否能承担

translation.en: And frankly, I wonder too, but we'll find out.
translation.zh:
‎老实说 我也担心
‎但我们得试试看才知道

translation.en: You may never work in this town again, Mank!
translation.zh:
‎你可能永远无法
‎在这里工作了 曼克！

translation.en: Orson, please…
translation.zh: ‎奥森 拜托…

translation.en: Then you force me to remind you!
translation.zh: ‎你逼我提醒你！

translation.en: We have a contract that you understood and agreed to.
translation.zh: ‎我们签了合同 你是理解并认可的

translation.en: If you fight this, it will go to what your new guild calls arbitration,
translation.zh:
‎如果你要反抗
‎就会进入你的新工会所谓的仲裁

translation.en: and you, my friend, will lose script, money,
translation.zh: ‎而你 我的朋友 会失去剧本、钱财

translation.en: and, assuming such a thing still exists in Hollywood,
translation.zh: ‎以及对信守诺言的人的尊重

translation.en: the respect of those who honor their word.
translation.zh: ‎如果这玩意在好莱坞还存在的话

translation.en: How can I put this nicely?
translation.zh: ‎我要怎么说得委婉一点？

translation.en: I may be a loose cannon,
translation.zh: ‎我也许是个不受控制的炮弹

translation.en: but you, my friend, are an outsider.
translation.zh: ‎但你是个局外人 朋友

translation.en: They're exasperated by me, and I've earned it,
translation.zh: ‎他们是被我惹恼的 这是我应得的

translation.en: but you, a self-anointed savior-hyphenate,
translation.zh:
‎而你 一个自命不凡
‎头衔众多的救世主

translation.en: they're just waiting to loathe you.
translation.zh: ‎他们都等着唾弃你呢

translation.en: Remind me never again to work with a washed-up alcoholic!
translation.zh:
‎记得告诫我
‎永远不要再和废物酒鬼合作！

translation.en: Duly noted. Nelson Algren, please copy.
translation.zh: ‎记住了 纳尔逊艾格林 请记录

translation.en: All right! No doubt you'll get your credit.
translation.zh: ‎好吧！你一定会得到署名

translation.en: But ask yourself, "Who's producing this picture?"
translation.zh:
‎但你扪心自问
‎“是谁出品了这部电影？”

translation.en: "Directing it? Starring in it?"
translation.zh: ‎“谁是导演？谁是主演？”

translation.en: That's what we need when Susan leaves Kane.
translation.zh: ‎苏珊离开凯恩的时候就要这样

translation.en: An act of purging violence.
translation.zh: ‎充斥暴力的一幕

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: ‎也许吧

translation.en: Mank, where are you?
translation.zh: ‎曼克！你在哪？

translation.en: Mank, come quick!
translation.zh: ‎曼克 快来！

translation.en: He's alive!
translation.zh: ‎他还活着！

translation.en: Ian's alive!
translation.zh: ‎伊恩活着！

translation.en: -He fetched up on the Orkneys! -The what?
translation.zh:
‎-他到奥克尼了！
‎-奥什么？

translation.en: The Orkney Islands, you idiot.
translation.zh: ‎奥克尼群岛 傻瓜

translation.en: Mank, are you ever serious?
translation.zh: ‎曼克 你就没有正经的时候吗？

translation.en: Only about something funny.
translation.zh: ‎我只对有趣的东西保持正经

translation.en: And the winner of the best original screenplay is…
translation.zh: ‎最佳原创剧本得主是…

translation.en: Herman J. Mankiewicz…
translation.zh: ‎赫尔曼J曼奇维兹…

translation.en: and Orson Welles for Citizen Kane.
translation.zh: ‎和奥森威尔斯 《公民凯恩》

translation.en: This is the first nomination and first win for Mr. Mankiewicz and Mr. Welles.
translation.zh:
‎这是曼奇维兹先生和威尔斯先生
‎首次被提名并获奖

translation.en: Neither were able to attend tonight.
translation.zh: ‎他们都未能参加今晚的典礼

translation.en: Accepting for both is the president of RKO Radio Pictures, Mr. George Schaefer.
translation.zh:
‎雷电华电影公司总裁
‎乔治谢弗先生代替二位领奖

translation.en: -Excuse me, Mr. Welles. -Good morning, gentlemen.
translation.zh:
‎（巴西 里约热内卢 1942年） ‎-抱歉 威尔斯先生
‎-早上好 先生们

translation.en: Morning, Mr. Welles. You missed a big night.
translation.zh:
‎（“都是真的”-广播新闻发布会） ‎威尔斯先生
‎你错过了一个重要的夜晚

translation.en: Well, I was unable to attend the Academy Awards
translation.zh: ‎我未能参加奥斯卡颁奖典礼

translation.en: because I'm here in Rio making a marvelous motion picture.
translation.zh: ‎因为我正在里约拍一部精彩的电影

translation.en: Kane was nominated in nine categories, including best actor.
translation.zh:
‎《公民凯恩》提名了九个奖项
‎包括最佳男主角

translation.en: Aren't you disappointed that it only won one Oscar?
translation.zh:
‎如果只拿到一座小金人
‎你不会失望吗？

translation.en: Well, that, my good man, is Hollywood.
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友 这就是好莱坞

translation.en: Anything you'd like to say to your coauthor, Mr. Mankiewicz?
translation.zh:
‎有什么要对你的联合创作人说的吗
‎曼奇维兹先生？

translation.en: I do have a brief message.
translation.zh: ‎我确实有句话要说

translation.en: You may tell him from me…
translation.zh: ‎你可以告诉他是我说的…

translation.en: "Mank, you can kiss my half!"
translation.zh: ‎曼克 我有一半荣誉呢 去你妈的！

translation.en: You ask me what my acceptance speech might have been.
translation.zh: ‎你问我的获奖感言会是怎样的

translation.en: Well, here goes.
translation.zh: ‎就是这样

translation.en: I am very happy to accept this award
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴以这样一种方式

translation.en: in the manner in which the screenplay was written,
translation.zh:
‎也就是没有
‎奥森威尔斯参与撰写剧本的情况下

translation.en: which is to say, in the absence of Orson Welles.
translation.zh: ‎接受这个奖项

translation.en: How's that?
translation.zh: ‎怎么样？

translation.en: How come he shares credit?
translation.zh: ‎他怎么会共同署名？

translation.en: Well, that, my friend, is the magic of the movies.
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友 这就是电影业的魔力

translation.en: Hold up the Oscar, Mank. Big smile.
translation.zh: ‎小金人举高一点 曼克 笑一笑
